comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ‚òÜ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

comments: Pretty good for finding it on Facebook. I'm liking it so far, but there's no tutorial or anything like it, so you're on your own figuring things out. Some item descriptions aren't in English, and the text after you gain things in combat for gold and souls goes too fast. Still don't know what it's saying.   Would recommend though just for a quick thing to do when you're bored and have time to kill.

A hidden gem. Premium currency is handed out in enough amounts to buy important things. Easy enough to figure out but a lack of a tutorial could turn away some. Only reason I took a star away because musketeer class line has high dex and str scaling skills..??

A surprising find, i really don't expected this game to have this level of quality. This game successfully give me the feeling of discovery and exploration while in expeditions, and i feel compelled to build and better the manor. But a disappointment is how there are no differences between characters other than their classes and aesthetics.

This game is great takes a little wile to figure out but it is no way a pay to play you have the option to buy gems that help u acheive things faster. Its not much of a grind either to acheive things that are less common with that said the classes are somewhat confusing finding the correct skill set and play style can be hard

The games is surprisingly fun and has lots of little things to discover throughout. It can be a bit complicated at times but the community at the discord is solid with the help. There are bugs here and there, but the devs are very active in trying to make the game very enjoyable. Give it some time, the game gets more challenging and complex. Highly recommended.

3 out of 4 members of the team died and the last one cannot carry the weight and I'm stuck because I have maximum load and I cannot leave the fight drop cannot collect cannot leave. I can't do anything. A big problem that should have been anticipated.. fixed

descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

======Contact Us======
Follow our Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2
Join Discussion: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2/groups

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

I have a problem with my account. My punk zombird was maxed out. Level 3. Then when I opened the game, my punk zombird was gone... I obtained that by waiting patiently and gathering 90 diamonds. I had to watch 3 15-30 sec long video for 2 diamonds each. After watching the 3 vids, I had to wait another 8 hours for it to be available again. It took me a month to obtain that bird and then all of a sudden it dissapears?! I obtained it again but I had to start all over again. I uninstalled this app because of that issue.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy üíé gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyoneüíñ you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

I was confident to delete the app from my phone cos it says that the game will be saved on my fb acc. But only the highest score remained and the potion got back to 1. I was already at 56! Deym! Ayusin nyo buhay nyo! Sayang effort ko! Aba!

description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

- reduced the size of the application
summary: We present to your attention a simple and exciting timekiller "Chop It"
title: Chop It

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!
descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time.
Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.
Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!


Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car.
2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket.
3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.
6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.

***Game features:***
- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.
- Daily bonuses.
- First-person mode.
- Richly detailed car models.
- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.
- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways.
- Interesting map of the city and its environs.
- Interactive gas station.
- Fun arcade-style missions.
- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims...
- Car showroom.
- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.

Additional bonus!
The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely,
and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!!

Hint!
New modern 3 muscle cars.

Bonus!
Baseball-bat.

description: Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!Featuring:‚Ä¢ Exploration of an ancient civilization‚Ä¢ Crafting and creative building‚Ä¢ Tribal life simulation games‚Ä¢ Exotic materials to mine‚Ä¢ Lots of free craft items to play with‚Ä¢ Amazing blocky graphics‚Ä¢ Animal pets to play withOne of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
descriptionHTML:
Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!

Featuring:
• Exploration of an ancient civilization
• Crafting and creative building
• Tribal life simulation games
• Exotic materials to mine
• Lots of free craft items to play with
• Amazing blocky graphics
• Animal pets to play with

One of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.

This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.

There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?

Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Creative crafting and exploration! Mine blocks, craft an Aztec city by hand!
title: Aztec Craft: Ancient Blocky City Building Games 3D

description: üòú You can‚Äôt miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you‚Äôre taken on a hilarious adventure where you‚Äôll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.üòä To spare their embarrassment, we‚Äôre not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won‚Äôt escape Troll Face‚Äôs ridiculous pranks. üò¨ TROLL OR BE TROLLED?How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time. ‚Ä¢ 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL‚Ä¢ Experience new controls ‚Ä¢ Unlock wacky achievements‚Ä¢ Conquer the global leaderboard‚Ä¢ Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi neededüòÅ So whether you‚Äôre a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you‚Äôre sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.   We love your feedback! What‚Äôs your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames
descriptionHTML:
😜 You can’t miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you’re taken on a hilarious adventure where you’ll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.

😊 To spare their embarrassment, we’re not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won’t escape Troll Face’s ridiculous pranks.

😬 TROLL OR BE TROLLED?
How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time.

• 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL
• Experience new controls
• Unlock wacky achievements
• Conquer the global leaderboard
• Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi needed

😁 So whether you’re a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you’re sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.

comments: Great game! Simplistic in the greatest form from graphics to game play. Would be 5 stars but -1 for placement of bottom ad I mean so easy to accidentally hit. Well placed I'm sure....With recent update I think you get random ad runs too. Game 5+ stars. 4 because of ads..

Smooth control. Awesome idea . Not Much more I can say about it.(First Review). Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars
Ads pop up during gameplay where your fingers contact so it stops game play ... other than that it's good but I've had enough. Fk you chilly:-p uninstalling

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

description: electric screen prank app is a super fun prank game. Prank your friends and family with this free game. Making jokes with this game is so simple; for example leave your mobile or tablet unlocked and when somebody touches the screen shall believe the screen creates electricity when is touched. The electricity effects and sounds simulate a electric shock.Have into account that this free app is just a game that simulates a electric screen shock. It is designed to joke with your friends and family. Kids and children also can have so much fun with this app. Besides the electric screen prank, the app also includes a mini game, which is used to obtain coins and unlock new lightning effects colors.The game consists of several parts: the electric screen prank game, the mini game Potty vs Bugs and the free coins virtual store. At the beginning the only available electric lightning color is the blue one. Other colors as red, yellow and green have to been unlocked. In order to do so the user needs to collect coins. Coins can be collected in several ways: playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, sharing on social networks (Facebook, Twitter or Google Plus) or watching rewarded videos. Each video the user watches gives +50 coins. If the player shares on any social network of the mentioned above also gets 50 coins but only for the first time that he/she shares.The free mini game included is Potty vs Bugs, an adventures platformer game based on a story of a potato, which has to pass 80 levels over 4 worlds to complete his mission. The game is really addictive and fun. The player will discover plenty of challenging levels, secret bricks full of rewards, hidden underground scenarios. Jump, run, swim, shoot fire balls and take a balloon to fly to the sky. There are plenty of different bugs awaiting the potato arrival. Many insects all over the 4 worlds, 8 final bosses in their respective castles. How to play this game is an easy task: move right or left, use the downward arrow of the game pad control to duck. Ducking on some tubes can make you go down through the pipes and find secret underground levels. Use the rightmost button to jump, and the one right on its left side to run and shoot fire balls. To run, the player has to keep the run button pressed while it moves right or left. Jumping is a bit tricky, since it depends on how long the user keeps the jump button pressed. As said before, the mini game is a great way of collecting coins to unlock new electric lightning color. Every level on the game is plenty of coins, some of them can be seen as part of the scenario, other are hidden on visible bricks and blocks, and the player can also find coins in secret blocks. The sky levels are a bonus to add more coins to the score of the game, which are used later to provide new content of the electric screen part. Remember that to store the coins collected in a level, the user has to finish that level.The design of the game is made thinking on create a environment to enjoy the prank app electric screen and have fun playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, all this joint to have a final goal, unlocking the strobe flash light effect. This shall be available once the user collects 2500 coins, then the user can have the electric lightning visual effect and the electric shock sound effect along with the strobe flashlight effect. Have into account that in order to enjoy of such effect your mobile device should have flashlight.

descriptionHTML:
~~~ WARNING: DO NOT TRY THIS AT (GENIUS) SCHOOL! ~~~
Cheating Tom’s back and he’s bolder than ever, in this awesome cheating game! This time he’s got to cheat his way through genius school! Help him pretend he’s one of the best students and cheat his way through biology, history, art, science and sports worlds! Something sinister seems to be going on at school – help Tom survive the craziness!

Tom’s gotten so good at cheating his way through school, that he’s been mistaken for a genius! He’s even been invited to a special genius school full of the brightest students. Something shady is going on - turns out the faculty is sucking out the students’ super brains with a brain-sucking machine and using their genius minds to take over the world! Help Tom graduate without getting his brain sucked out!

Features:
> Help Tom cheat his way through genius school!
> Help Tom master the crazy worlds of biology, history, art, science and sports!
> Choose your avatar - Tom or Taffy – and get cheating!
> 100 challenging game levels & extra special game modes for extra fun cheating.
> New upgradeable power-ups and in-game currency to enhance gameplay.
> Nasty teachers & totally nerdy students with new behaviors!
> Awesome yearbook with tons of ridiculous students and teachers!

description: Dinosaur World Craft Exploration:Lite - an exciting game in prehistoric cubic universe where you build, construct, create & craft - using blocks - in world! Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. Build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest constructions! Start the adventure with ‚ÄúDino Jurassic Craft Exploration‚Äù! This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! This pocket edition (exploration) game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world craft generation. Build a dinosaur world!Craft & Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This  pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‚ÄòDino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution‚Äô - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! Go beyond your wildest dreams, make your own cube jurassic world, mine, castle or city! Great game for adults! And teens! Transform the surface in a 3D environment in Jurassic Jungle! Build shelter, fight, grow and use blocky craft. The only limit is your imagination! Start a cube world craft! There is only way to get rid of this hell which threaten her mental health. Face it! descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to face your fears?

You are in a hospital corridor which fear and horror in nested.
You are feeling which fear and death pester to you in every step.

In a hospital which contains paranormal activities, it is very difficult to survive if your nerves is not hard as steel.
You can't determine who is angel who is devil.

Extraordinary atmosphere, nervous scenario and blood-curdling flow, you are one step ahead of comic book horror game.

In second story, young girl couldn't get rid of nightmares and curiosity. There is only way to get rid of this hell which threaten her mental health. Face it! Of course young man won't leave alone the girl and our story continues from where it left.

If you have courage, what are you waiting for?

- Amazing graphics
- Detailed areas
- Unique musics
- Completely free

Note: We recommend that play the game with headset.

comments: Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

The reason for my lower rating is simply because it's available on the android TV store, I can use a mouse to navigate the interface, but I cannot map the controls to the Nvidia shield gamepad, the inbuilt mapper doesn't recognize most buttons including thumb stick for steering. It effectively makes this game unplayable on the Nvidia shield.

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down thoüòÇ Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developersüòäüôè Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.

comments: Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

Only game that has not begged for money and really is fun to play if you can keep up with all the fares driver's n cabs. Just try it yourself. It can be addicting if you don't take your eyes from it haha

comments: The game is very good and beautiful, but the thing is that why should I pay to keep playing? ü§î That's really disappointing actually, because some people don't even have money, so that's so not fair at all. If you could make free please it would be super amazing! Thank you in advance.

Love, love, love Gamehouse games! Every games I've played so far had a great storyline, graphics are outstanding & the game never gets boring as I replay them over and over! My only complaint would be u can only go mainly to level 10 on most! Hearts medicine let's you play all 60!

I've bought all the past delicious Emily games and never had a problem. I've bought thus version and am having problems. The games sticks alot. Bit I've played first world lvl 6 successfully. However have not received the diamond. I have not burned or spilled anything, multiple times but cannot get my diamond. I know this seems minimal, but at the end in completing the backyard it will in fact be important. Please help

I played the first four levels, bought it, then the levels all locked up and I can't play anymore. I reinstalled it as well, and it just keeps locking them all. I can't click any of the levels now. Super sad. EDIT: The game just randomly unlocked all the levels this morning. Yay! I'm so glad, I've been able to play past what I could yesterday and redid my review.

I really like the Delicious series, but I was just so disappointed with this one for these reasons:  - I paid to unlock the episodes, they are locked the next day.  - Lagging (can bare with it though).   Please fix these or give me refund. I rather get the problems fixed if possible.

This was one of the hardest Emily games...but the graphics were awesome and it's ones of the smoothest with least amount of bugs.  In that end I enjoyed it, but I will not get all the trophies. I LOATHE the "add 5 friends" trophy. I'm not going to do it this time. I just won't have all the trophies.

Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (‚ùó) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily‚Äôs newest story, Moms vs Dads!  ‚ôÇÔ∏è ‚ôÄÔ∏èüèÜ Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!üèÜ Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levelsüèÜ Get to know the differences between the four couples! descriptionHTML:
The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious? ♂️ ♀️

We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads! ♂️ ♀️

🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!
🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels
🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?
🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house
🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard
🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds
🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones
🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in life

Emily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽

Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
summary: Join Emily and Patrick in a hilarious battle of the sexes!
title: Delicious - Moms vs Dads

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you‚Äôre ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that‚Äôs why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you‚Äôre not scared, and you‚Äôre ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn‚Äôt made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don‚Äôt cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

comments: Won't let me play 1st level. The screen shows what i think is a pause menu over the game. The screen says start but it will never start no matter where you press non of the buttons work. Game sucks. I dont know how it plays because it wont let me play. Dont install this app its bugged

A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

Not bad for free. Minimal ads. The two drawbacks are that in career mode, the game is slanted in the opponents favour too much. And in 1 on 1, it takes forever to load an opponent. Fix that and I would give it a five star rating. Also, it would be nice to see the developer actually respond to some people's concerns.

comments: So far, I dig this game. Although, the individuality of it is scarce. I still play it and enjoy it. It's not identical to other games of this type, as the challenges are similar yet different. The scenario of the game is basic with the others. I have a variety when it comes to games, this one has similar sound affects to other games that I, personally, downloaded. (But they're also from the same makers.) This game is over all.... Good so far.. I would recommend, linked my account to this game and invited friends and family. (I only do so, if the game/app is worthy. I'm a picky bull!!!!) Overall, you'll have fun! Cute toys and  unique power ups, with a slightly (10%) twist.

Definitely addicting. The levels are challenging, the tools are fun to figure out and the reward set up is not unattainable. The only other thing is they grew more wise  for the latest update, you can't change the time on your phone to add lives anymore! Probably better that way, one (read: I) should pace themselves when playing....

This is by far the most fun I've  had with a game app! Its so cute and  colorful!  And each increase in difficulty  makes you want to keep coming back for the next challenge.  What also makes it awesome  is a no brainer,  its great for children and adults alike.  BIG THUMBS UP!

Really enjoyed the game until I was entered in a two week tournament.  Now, the boards are incredibly difficult and I can no longer earn prizes on a regular basis. Of course, I suppose that's by design so I spend money. Which I won't do. I just want some "bubblegum" to past the time.  Now, it's making my blood pressure rise...  Also amazing how many 5 ‚≠ê ratings they get in one day without the user giving explanations on why. Seems suspicious...

I  love this game but why does it take 30 minutes for a life to refill and also why does everyone who plays the game not receive ten lives only some of your players this needs to be fixed it's not fair I've been playing for years and only receive five lives at a time when others receive ten lives.I play other games and the lives refill every 7 to 15 minutes. Can you please make changes

Nice game challenging to think ahead. But, basically this game is cheating on you. Levels are far too difficult to complete without boosters. So, after failing several times the not so random appearing tiles give you a lot of boosters. That prevents to uninstall (at least until you master the highest level and you enter the Legends Arena) !

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

I don't think levels are nessecary. Basically, they don't exactly apply to anything so put them in 'task list' based on days you need to do. Also,controls and graphics are pretty good but try to polish them a bit. It needs some work. Please make this more interesting.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.

This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids‚Äô breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom‚Äôs daily life. comments: Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

I really like 90% of this game. However, the way the passes are done really suck. I absolutely love when the 30 days unlimited ad free pass comes up for $9.99. Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

Love this game! The only part I don't like is that all of the best options cost diamonds and you literally have to pay for them. It makes sense for an app, but it happens to often. It ruins the story because I won't buy any diamonds. I'll rate this 5 stars if they at least change it to not as often.

I'm ashamed to say that I did not give this app the chance it deserved. However, I got over myself and OMG all I can say is that it is worth every penny and every ad. I love it. I have read for hours now (which means charging my phone while reading, lol). My one request : more stories allowing me to pick the gender of my romance option(s).

I like the game but waiting three hours for two passes is terrible.  And we have no other option to get free passes it is either wait or pay. I feel like I'd we got more than two passes I would be okay with the wait. But waiting three hours knowing I am going to use those two tickets in less than a half hour is crazy.  Then I will lose interest in the story and forget what had happen, it isn't okay. But other than the wait for passes I really like this game.

I really like the idea of the whole game.  And the episodes are pretty good in length depending on what story you use. But I think it is completely ridiculous that you have to wait 4 hours for more passes.  Overall,  if you don't mind waiting and are a very patient person then I do recommend this app for you.  However if patience is a virtue you don't have then you should find a different app.

descriptionHTML:
Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. Or, become a creator and write your own! <3

Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. From your favorite movie titles like Mean Girls to fan faves such as Bad Boy’s Girl, Episode will keep you interacting for hours.

With all your favorite genres, there’s no time like the present to fall in love, rise to fame, or solve a decade-old mystery. Better yet, join this incredible community and become a creator of your own - writing stories, amassing lots of fans along the way.

facebook.com/TheEpisodeApp

THE BELLAS ARE BACK and they’re getting into deep treble. Sing in the spotlight and live out your dream of becoming a BELLA in PITCH PERFECT IN DEEP TREBLE™!

You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?

comments: 3 stars because the spins are not giving what is needed for the game. It's a cute game. I enjoy playing with my daughter. However, shields do not spin enough. I know you want us to pay for another spin but maybe award a higher number once in a while. All in all cute game.

This game was fun initially. But as you rank up, you gain coins and then before you get to even use them, someone is able to steal them from you (by random spinning.. no planned attack!!)   If you play this game,DO NOT SPEND MONEY TO BUY SPINS. People can steal your earnings... so you basically pay actual money, to give others coins...

I need help so I spent $10 in order to get to the next level which I did where I could get my daily spin and hit jackpot and it gave me my fox but I closed the app and it took me backwards to the last level even though I already built in my new level. Please help and put me back to the level ahead of me as this is very upsetting for spending money and being right back where I was before. Fix it and I'll give it 5 stars for everything thank you

I gave 2 star only because when i joined my frnd i did not got any spin..... Though that is shown in my village news...  This is the 2nd time missed the spin.. Do you know it is diffcult to get spin and when you convince a friend to join and you got nothing.....

description: Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!Spin to earn your lootSpin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!Attack and Raid fellow vikings!Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village! Collect all the Cards!It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greaterPlay with friends!Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures! ‚òÖ Battle your way to be the next Coin Master with your friends by your side.‚òÖ Join in millions of players worldwide!‚òÖ Coin Master is free on all devices with in-app purchases.Follow Coin Master on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!Facebook: www.facebook.com/coinmasterAre you having problems? Please contact us in the game by clicking on the menu > Settings > Support or email us at info@moonactive.com

The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.What is this SuperHero Game all about:This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.

What is this SuperHero Game all about:

This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.

How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?

You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:

descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to face the Scary Shark? Brace yourselves...because the beast is back!

Just as monstrous as before, sharks are back to chew through your sense of safety! Attack unexpecting campers and beach-goers! Play as this astounding yet terrifying aquatic mammal.

Navigate its home and ocean environment full of multiple sea creatures and prey. Say hello to fish and stingrays, dolphins, and whales. But beware of bounty hunters and snipers. Defend your home and fulfill your voracious appetite! In this game, it’s HUNT or be HUNTED!

Use your keen sense of smell to find and chase the innocent human enjoying the water on a sunny, calm day. Attack boats, surfers, and jet skiis with your massive jaws and tear them to shreds! Don’t let them escape, or they will bring friends and lifeguards to hunt you! Swim and creep under boardwalks, docks, and different water environments.

The deadliest games of 2017 awaits you.


Scary Shark Evolution 3D Features:
• Realistic Beach environments to explore
• Multiple Missions packed with Hunting Thrill
• Multiple Texture of Scary Shark to Choose from
• Smooth, Easy & Addictive gameplay
• Real water physics, cool Shark movements and animations
• Beautifully crafted 3D graphics and realistic water environments: including beaches, docks and the open sea
• Amazing joystick simulator controls to make the Shark swim and attack
• Exciting Sharks missions for you to create chaos
• Super Awesome Visuals and sound Effects

Install and enjoy as a fearless Scary Shark Evolution Adventures!
summary: Rush into the underwater sea and experience the scary shark evolution adventures
title: Scary Shark Evolution 3D

descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

description:
The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
‚Ä¢ 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!‚Ä¢ Troll famous video games!‚Ä¢ 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!‚Ä¢ Unlock insane achievements!‚Ä¢ Lots of wacky collectibles!‚Ä¢ No Wi-fi needed!‚Ä¢ A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that‚Äôll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber‚Äôs go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It‚Äôs payback time for all those levels you didn‚Äôt complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?

Troll adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber’s go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It’s payback time for all those levels you didn’t complete.

TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT

A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!

Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?
summary: Spoof your favorite video games in this exciting new trolling adventure!
title: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2

description: Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.List of safety tips:- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator- Stand straight facing the elevator's door- Press the button of the desired level- Keep the elevator neat and clean- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level- Stand still till the door is completely open- Prefer stairs in case of fireLift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Lift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game is designed specifically for kids.

descriptionHTML:
Protect your empire by shooting and battling the zombie army that wants to steal your resources in Last Empire - War Z, a strategy RPG and base building war game. Build an army with other players from around the globe and plan an attack with your own zombie army! Develop your kingdom and befriend empire allies to combat both zombie and human enemies. Do you have what it takes to be the strongest commander?

Last Empire - War Z is a zombie-themed free-to-play war strategy game. Battle zombie troops and survivors to protect your empire against the upcoming zombie war. Team up with friends from around the world to build an army, increase your zombie defense strategy and participate in special events. Take part in brutal zombie warfare and build an army to grow your empire – surviving the zombie apocalypse is in your hands in Last Empire - War Z!

Last Empire - War Z Features:

Strategy War Games & Empire Defense 
*Strategy war games pit you against an endless zombie horde!
*Empire building games – Base building strategy that encourages players to work together and achieve powerful bonuses!
*Build a zombie defense strategy during in-game events and regular survivor challenges for great rewards!

Battle Zombie Troops with Alliance Members

*Empire allies battle with you to destroy zombie troops and other survivors to expand your empire.

Build an Army with Zombie & Human Troops
* Build an army of deadly Zombie Troops to destroy your enemies and defend your empire!
* Zombie apocalypse survivors can be recruited and upgraded with unique war skills and strategy.
* Strategy is everything. Varied Skill Trees allow players to enhance their heroes.

Build an army of zombie troops, battle to survive the zombie apocalypse, and defend your empire in Last Empire - War Z!

NOTE: Last Empire – War Z is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

descriptionHTML:
Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process.


Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.
4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.
5) Make ultrasound scan to see in what state the babies are in.
6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.
7) Play with her child, help her to do so as well.
8) Make the baby go to sleep, so you can help Melissa dress.


A game for young children who want to become a doctor in the near future. Test your skills to the limit and show the world that you can become a doctor. With so many mommy’s to select from and so many prince and princesses to come in this world. You surely can be the best surgery doctor on playstore

comments: I don't see what's so great about this game. All you do is run around, kill people, and collect coins. I'm seeing all these reviews saying "great game bad controls," and I'm convinced that they're fake accounts created by the devs. The game sucks and holds no substance, but the controls are just fine. I've played the "updated" version, but it's the exact same thing; run around, kill things, and collect coins.

BEWARE My son downloaded this game on his tablet, and the first time he played this game, it completely crashed and wiped out his tablet, and we cannot get it to load past the first screen that shows the brand of the tablet.  It is no longer usable.  Very disappointing.  His tablet is less than two months old.
I love this game!! This is so fun! I'm already at level 3. I like how you can go to so many did fret places! The weird though is that I don't kill the women xddddd

Would have rated it a five I love the game but the problem here is it's hard to maneuver the screen when trying to get a view from behind, also sometimes when trying to get through some of the tunnels in the cave it sometimes would stop you from entering can you fix this? If not I'm ok but another problem is sometimes in the timed cave number ten you can't find any people to kill so you just die trying. I don't see a point of trying to kill 30 people when there's none to be found. I have died and not passed this level because of this problem.

Has potential What i would add to make this app award worthy: Add different types, sizes, or colors of werewolves, rag doll effects, dismemberment options in settings, an animation of the transformation at the beginning of each level, and it would be fun if there was a mode where you could infect people. Good game, but needs updates in gameplay if it's ever going to be worth paying money to download.

Intrusive ads and poor lighting The first and fourth levels are extremely annoying due to horrible lighting. I get that it's in a cave but it's very easy to get into awkward positions where you have to wildly flail the camera around to find out where you are... While ads keep randomly covering the screen. Not a bad game but the cave levels ruin it due to being purely frustrating.

comments: I love this game so much!!! But you need to make some changes and some additions to the game fast! Some changes. Make to md80 look more realistic. They are too short in the game. You need to make them bigger! Also make the planes more attractive. Additions! More and more airplanes! Embraers, bombardier crjs, 737 800, private jets, and more general aviation planes. Also can you add charter flights and charter airlines like Omni Air International. And of course add some more airlines. Sun Country, Spirit Air, Allegiant Air, and can you put American Airlines on the a320 list. That would great if you make those changes and additionsüëåüëç. And if you do, I will give the game five stars.

Awesome game easy controls.  I like the lit runway at night and the window view from inside the plane.  Could you lower the cost  of the gates in level 4 so we can get more planes please?  All 5's for the great job.   Could you do D/FW International  in the next update?  I live in the Dallas area, would really be a challenge for you.  Thanks for an awesome game.

I love aviation and this game is perfection. But how can I log in so that I don't lose the progress. I mean, if my phone breaks I will have to start from zero on a different device. All the time and money I invested will be gone. Please add a log in through Facebook or something else. Something to preserve the progress. I would be more encouraged to spend real money in the game if I knew it's safe. Also, I have the same suggestion others made: other planes Embraer, Ilyushin, Antonov, Bombardier. Thank you! Otherwise the game is incredible, so authentic! Every update just makes it better.

Great game, i enjoyed it with the new update. Though can you add more cargo jet like the Antonovs and Boeing 767F, regional jet like bombardier CRJ or embraer E-jet cause they're more common now and some props like Q series or other manufacturer. The landing animation needed the reverse engine thrust part so it will be more realistic, thank you.

This game is superb. Vector Studios have created the ultimate ATC game here, with great graphics and fun gameplay. There are a wide variety of airliners and airlines to go with them, meaning you can create a personalised airport atmosphere.   There are a few instances of liveries being on the wrong planes, but this does not really matter. I would love it if you added another turboprop like a Q400, and an Embraer RJ would be nice. Otherwise, thank you for this amazing game, and I hope you keep updating it. The only downside is that at the start of a game the gameplay is a boy slow and be, especially in small airports...

I love that you can have different planes different airlines different terminals, but the runways need to be twice as long. A big plane needs much more take of space. More airport ground means more terminals. The airport needs more gates. Make it like San Francisco busy airport with cross runaways with wind changes. Heathrow has airlines dedicated to certain terminals.  Just make it really big with lots of gates and really busy with lots of arrivals and departures. Make it like or copy a real life busy airport.

- Select a coloring page for coloring
- Select the color you like
- Tap on the area you like to draw
- Save your car coloring pages with camera button
- Press zoom for catch the details
- Press erase for removing any color
- Slide the brushes to reach more colors

Join fun and enjoy with this free game!
summary: Fruits Vegetables Coloring Book For Kids is coloring, painting game for toddlers
title: Fruits Vegetables Coloring Book For Kids
