description: Its a physics puzzle game.Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
descriptionHTML:
Its a physics puzzle game.
Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity.
You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..
When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!
Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!
This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
summary: Its a nice brain-training game.
title: Puzzle Studio - Physical Line

description: You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. Also in the game there are mini games that diversify the whole game process. For example, in one mini-game you have to climb up a large tree, avoiding spines. In another mini-game you have to work with different blocks to build a solid bridge and pass it.Good luck to you free game.
descriptionHTML:
You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.
In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.
Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.
The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. Also in the game there are mini games that diversify the whole game process. For example, in one mini-game you have to climb up a large tree, avoiding spines. In another mini-game you have to work with different blocks to build a solid bridge and pass it.
Good luck to you free game.
developerAddress: Russia, city Kamyshin, street Mira, index 403874
summary: Get to know craft to escape from prison.
title: Jailbreak Craft

comments: The game is cute. Very straightforward and not at all time consuming but relaxing to check in every  once in a while. I loved visiting my Axolotl every day. Mine grew up to almost 9 cm! Unfortunalely, I didn't  check in for a few days. I checked every day until suddenly I forgot. Poor Lottie is gone now but I'm going to do my best to be a good virtual Axolotl owner this time!! The only thing I would like differently is I'd like more interactions with the axolotl and to be able to zoom in. Anyways, its an overall lovely game. Simple but sweet.

It's like having an Axolotl, but on your phone! It's extremely hard to find one around where I live, so I guess this is the closest one I could get for now? I love Axolotls and I dream of getting my own smiling water-walker. They're so cute! Thank you for making this app I love it. But try to make more options in communicating with the little dude. And I like the idea of scrubbing the screens instead of pushing a button. Something that will make it not too button-pressy-game thingy?

AMAZING AND SUPER CUTE! Doesn't take up alot of storage. I think it needs more interactions but that's is! Also could you add a feature to get another pet after your original has been alive for a certain amount of days because they look lonely.

Cute and fun, even if it's not 100% realistic. The axolotl doesn't do much, but neither does a real one. It would be nice if you could change the tank decor and choose different colors of axolotl (or even have a random color when you get a new one). I like that it doesn't require as much care as a real axolotl, who wants a game on their phone to be that much work? I'm also curious to see how big it will get. Real axolotls can get to 30cm or more, but at just under 7cm my virtual one already takes up most of the screen space. All in all I like the app.

I think that you definitely need more things to do. It would be great if you could do more things and maybe get more Axolotl! THEY MUST BE SO LONELY! I also think that it should let u personalise the tank and maybe make it so u can design your Axolotl! Other than that it is a EPIC game. (Will rake 5 star if u do) ;-)

I've got 91 days now. My Axel started out just a little boy & now he's gotten so big. I love my boy(even though he doesn't do anything unless u touch the screen & then he just goes where u direct him)but he's still adorable. My friend downloaded this app same time I did & killed 2 of her pets & gave up. Not a good pet owner(even if it is virtual). I love my Axel. This is cool. It helps teach u some responsibility, if ur humane enough to keep up with the feeding & cleaning.

descriptionHTML:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the 「Axolotl」 to this already popular game! FREE DOWNLOAD! It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

■Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.
■Watch how cute your Axolotl moves. It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone. It`s so easy to raise. Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week. This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious. Try this game out! It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise. Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.
- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen. Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Axolotl a name. You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Axolotl grows in realtime. The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
summary: How would you like to experience the warm feeling of raising your own Axolotl?
title: Axolotl Pet

descriptionHTML:
Next chapter of Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D scary game! Defend yourself against robot bears, angry chickens, bunnies and foxes and even worse creatures hiding in the shadows! Welcome to the Cube nightmare safeguarding yourself until the morning comes! Open or close the doors and switch on the light not to let cube bears, foxes and bunnies attack you! Use the flashlight to protect yourself from the attack! It will scare away angry cube creatures that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways!

Nevertheless, be careful! If any cube monster has crept too close, it will be the end of your security guard career… Moreover, the life! Face your nightmare with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game!

Spend five nights at Cube pizzeria hiding from angry cube bears, chickens, bunnies and foxes! Are you afraid of cube bears or other monsters? These robots were made to help in Cube Pizzeria, but during the night they might become unpredictable or even attack you! Who else could be in this nightmare mines? Spend five nights at pizzeria full of scary cube monster! Try Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game – meet cube bear robots and escape from them to survive!

Be a security guard for chicken, fox, bunny and bear robots for five nights and protect Cube Pizzeria from total destruction! Use very limited amount of electricity per night to protect yourself from robots’ attack! Stay in your security office, watch cube creatures with cameras and try to survive! When you run out of power for the night - all cameras and light are off and cube robots are able to move! Beware of cube bear robots walking in the pizzeria! Escape from your nightmare! Face cube robots with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2!

Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 features:

- Cube robot monsters – chickens, foxes, bunnies and bears!
- Different camera views
- 3D Cube World
- New Cube Pizzeria locations to explore
- Five nights to survive

Don’t allow cube bear monsters or angry bunnies and foxes to get close to your security office! They all are robots! Spend five nights at Cube Pizzeria and stay alive! Finish your work safe after five scary and horrible nights with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game! Survive being a pizzeria night security guard and escape from your nightmare! These five nights are going to be the worst nights in your life!

comments: Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

If possible need there needs to be another look at the position of your car during the race. Ice noticed mulitple times that once i get to first place, i win in first but when i go ro collect thw reward cash it always says seventh or eighth place.. its really irking.  Please fix. Otherwise i do enjoy the game

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

This game has definitely improved since I'd last played it but, there is still some room for improvement. Controls are one thing. This has always been a problem. More controls need to be added, like the steering wheel. Also, real tracks and events. I'm not sure can you actually do this but if you can, please add this and also, graphics. If you could put in some better shaders and if you could improve upon the car models. This game is okay. I rate this 6/10.

descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

descriptionHTML:
Play in the pony dream house and take care of a little pink baby pony! Splash water in a bubble bath, mash green peas, change diapers, put her to bed and have sweet dreams!

Become the best baby pony nanny and take care of the cute pink baby pony girl. Spend the whole day playing lovely baby pony dress up games for kids, change smelly diapers, prepare delicious puree and baby pony bottles, and have sweet little dreams at night!

Pony Sisters Baby Horse Care baby pony games for kids:
· Take care of the cutest baby pony girl all day!
· Splash water, pop the bubbles, wash, clean and have fun in the bath!
· Dress up with the fancy little baby pony clothes and add the cutest head accessories!
· Prepare the most delicious pea puree, baby pony formula and feed her!
· Change smelly diapers, clean baby pony and make her happy!
· Put the cutest pink baby pony to bed and play bedtime rhymes!
· Dream about a baby pony princess, a fairy and a pop star!
· Catch the birds, fly over the flower meadow and pop musical notes in your dreams!
· Watch videos for kids and toddlers to get bonus coins!


Free & Paid Game Content
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money.
You can play Bedtime, Pea Puree and Dress Up mini games for free.
You can purchase separate mini games (Bubble Bath, Diapers and Formula) or the full game version with no ads.

Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

descriptionHTML:
Join Phil in his latest Faily Adventure as he finds himself hurtling through downtown “San Fran Faily” on a Skateboard.

In this physics based game you must maneuver an endless city scape full of dangerous and hilarious obstacles including busy streets, alleyways, parks, buildings and rooftops resulting in the usual Faily fun and near misses and best of all ultimate CRASHES.

FEATURES
• NAVIGATE as far as you can go avoiding obstacles along the way
• AVOID traffic, trams, pedestrians and all types of unexpected obstacles
• DESTROY obstacles with your shield or weapons
• COLLECT coins as you go
• UNLOCK unique boards and costumes
• RECORD gameplay and share to Youtube, Facebook or Instagram
• ENDLESS gameplay
• ENDLESS crashes
• ENDLESS fun!

* Permissions Details *
Faily Skater will require access to photos, media and files on your device. This is only used to cache the advertising in game and to allow the sharing of custom screenshots taken in game.

That had made me have to play it from the beginning again and over againüòë Infact, even I already connected my Google Play account to it..still I have to lost my progress again Wish you can fix this

This is a cool little game, fun and easy. The music is great. Would have been 5 stars if I didn't have to pay for the game to run smooth (no ads). Also had a very annoying reset issue after paying to remove ads.

Fun game. Cool to add Assassin's Creed stuff. I am a fan of AC so playing as a tiny Assassin is cute and fun. Challenging and frustrating at the sane time, but enjoyable. However...I am curious as to the Assassin selection. They added non popular Assassins like Evie/Jacob...and side characters such as Adewale. No Edward? No Connor? What gives? I'd trade all three of those nobodies for Connor lol.

The reason I have given it 4 stars as it's annoying to see that it doesn't save your progress. You teach a certain level and unlock almost all if the characters, to find out that when you start the application it resets to 0

For some reason every time I exit the game it always resets and goes back to zero and I lose everything I have. I purchased no in game ads and I don't know if that is the case but I would like this to be fixed. This is a very fun game but I don't want to have to play it over and over to keep unlocking things.

Horrible optimization due to ads. When I open the game with my wifi off it works fine. As soon as I turn on the wifi and the game stars fetching ads the whole gameplay becomes laggy and slow. It's not even in a state of being called free to play. x(

comments: This game is very amazing, and accurate with everything! The slopes, obstacles, color changes, and the points all seem accurate to any song. Like how it does work with any mp3. Small problems with songs with lyrics, but I do not listen to much of those anyways (I take that back there is no problem actually). It is amazing! I would really be appreciated if you made more styles AbstractArt! Great especially for a unity made mobile game.

it was love at first sight. beutiful visuals that match each song perfectly. a simple but adictive game that i cant recommend enough. a fair warning though, if you have visual epilepsy DO NOT play this game for it has strong flashing lights

My first thought when I opened uo the game and saw that it was made in unity I was expecting a broken half assed game. However, this game is crafted very well. Amazing effects for the sound pitches of the music played and the screen shake makes you really feel the music. For the car selection its pretty good. But personally, I would reccomend only including cars from the 70s to 90s. Since i'm guessing you're going with a vaporwave vibe, a modern car such as the jaguar isn't really the best thing in my opinion. Cars I would reccomend would be the Lamborghini Diablo, Ferrari Testarossa, Ferrari 348TB, any classic Porsche 911, ofcourse the delorean and any other 80s retro car.

Many games I play on a mobile device either start out lame or end up lame. But this is game gives me more joy than many other games combined. Its a masterpiece, now slap a price tag on it to make it worth your while. Good luck, AbstractArt.

I overally love the game itself, it just lack a bit if features. For example: -Song search -Difficulty settings -Speed settings Add these, and you have an awesome rhythm based racing game on mobile. The Devs did a great job.
Surprisingly awesome! Got it after seeing Neon Drive gameplay. Only problem is that when u hit a column, the screen flashes too long. I end up hitting more and more because I can't see.

comments: Amazing and a unique type of game. The currency is all obtainable even as a free to play. Cool looking dragons and the movement in the game more lively than just pictures. I've played many app before this and I would say that this is top 1 so far. The only problem is the game will stop and crash. I don't know the reason but I've tried in another device and also stops working. Overall the game is magnificent and I definitely recommend it to everyone!

Awesome! I really like the game. Top 5 game? Worth it! I've played some similar game but this one is the best. The graphic is great and the dragons are cute. The resources are not too hard to get. The best part is the drag-skill! It's really different. Each dragon have their skill effect with different area form. You have to drag it right. A long way to be a master tamer. So enjoy the process!

I Tried this game with fair expectations, and even as I started i thought it might not be as fun as some other ones I've tried. But this game legitimately blew my standards away! It looks great, latency is great, gameplay is great! It's just a great game. Characters have simple tropes but are written in a likable way, which can't be said for alot of games. Everything about this game is very approachable and fun, and not to mention really nice to look at. I'm a fan for sure!

This game is awesome. The graphics are beautiful. The game is really unique because of the dragging skills. This game definitely give you a lot of chance for getting a good dragon. In my opinion it is action packed. Overall the game is awesome. The only reason I rate 4 stars is because of the fact that the game crashes several times and sometimes freezes. However, this game is still the best game out of all the other dragon game I played.

Pretty well made game afterall, all currency ingame can be obtained in fairly free and quick way. The game also offers really big help/supply for newbies. Spend a few (for me 3)days and you can already get 3 times of 11 advanced draw. Can get a little bit of grindy but not pay to win either. The flaws being some English translation error and extreme flashy visual effects, and the lack of (limited even) variety of the dragons and campaign plot.

Good games guys but the summon rate for a 5 star is too low. Im one of the top players on the server. When i do get a 5 star its one that i already have. Also the log in event is not working for the American server. Even if you pay. Its a waste cuz rates are too low. So don't

description: Express yourself and become a style maven in the #1 dressup boutique simulation game!Designed for style savvy women of all ages, it‚Äôs free to play and you can play Fashion Empire while offline. The game is constantly updated and full of fabulous gameplay-- CHIC FASHIONS to sell, mix and match and grow your fortune- DECORATE your boutiques with thousands of gorgeous decorations- DESIGN thousands of unique items ranging from elegant to edgy- DRESS UP yourself and your trendy staff any way you choose- MAKEOVERS with all the latest makeup and cosmetics trends- COLLECT and covet special designer, elite and signature items- SHOP furniture - racks, tables, registers, displays and much more - STORY mode with fashion shows, fascinating characters and freedom- ADVENTURE to the top with hundreds of quests across many cities- WIN big and show off in online challenges - it‚Äôs fashion week every day!- JOIN a vibrant fashion loving communityThe game is free to play and in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency.Game background and how to play:1/ You start in San Francisco, an aspiring designer just opened your first shop. You've always been creative, from playing dress up with barbie dolls as a kid, hours on the sims, learning to sketch and creating an amazing portfolio at a top design academy. Together with your investor Eva you'll begin by designing your very first item - a gorgeous pink dress which is sure to bring in initial shoppers2/ After making your first sales you'll want to expand capacity for racks, registers, dressing rooms - and don't forget decorations to attract the style minded clients.3/ As your boutique grows you'll learn more and unlock more outfit categories of items - shoes, heels, bags, purses, rompers, jumpsuits, makeup, cosmetics, accessories and more.4/ After a while you'll probably find yourself busy as the sole worker in your boutique - it will be time to find the perfect staff to join you on your journey. But first you'll need to find a way to persuade them to join - and each have their own story to tell and personality to work with.5/ San Francisco is just the beginning, soon you'll be expanding to Las Vegas, Miami, Los Angeles and even New York. There you'll get to know celebs and stars who will warm to your unique style and, in time, crave and covet your latest collections. And who knows what glamorous occasions you'll be designing for...6/ Your reputation is starting to grow and it's time to prove yourself on the world stage amongst millions of other players. This is your chance to show your interior designs and outfits in challenging online themed contests, whether it's celebrity style or coffee casual, from red carpet to haute couture runway...Ladies, the next big dressup game is here - it's time to write YOUR stylish story.Questions or requests? Email us at fashionempire@frenzoo.com
descriptionHTML:
Express yourself and become a style maven in the #1 dressup boutique simulation game!

Designed for style savvy women of all ages, it’s free to play and you can play Fashion Empire while offline. The game is constantly updated and full of fabulous gameplay-

- CHIC FASHIONS to sell, mix and match and grow your fortune
- DECORATE your boutiques with thousands of gorgeous decorations
- DESIGN thousands of unique items ranging from elegant to edgy
- DRESS UP yourself and your trendy staff any way you choose
- MAKEOVERS with all the latest makeup and cosmetics trends
- COLLECT and covet special designer, elite and signature items
- SHOP furniture - racks, tables, registers, displays and much more
- STORY mode with fashion shows, fascinating characters and freedom
- ADVENTURE to the top with hundreds of quests across many cities
- WIN big and show off in online challenges - it’s fashion week every day!
- JOIN a vibrant fashion loving community

The game is free to play and in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency.

Game background and how to play:

1/ You start in San Francisco, an aspiring designer just opened your first shop. You've always been creative, from playing dress up with barbie dolls as a kid, hours on the sims, learning to sketch and creating an amazing portfolio at a top design academy. Together with your investor Eva you'll begin by designing your very first item - a gorgeous pink dress which is sure to bring in initial shoppers

2/ After making your first sales you'll want to expand capacity for racks, registers, dressing rooms - and don't forget decorations to attract the style minded clients.

3/ As your boutique grows you'll learn more and unlock more outfit categories of items - shoes, heels, bags, purses, rompers, jumpsuits, makeup, cosmetics, accessories and more.

4/ After a while you'll probably find yourself busy as the sole worker in your boutique - it will be time to find the perfect staff to join you on your journey. But first you'll need to find a way to persuade them to join - and each have their own story to tell and personality to work with.

5/ San Francisco is just the beginning, soon you'll be expanding to Las Vegas, Miami, Los Angeles and even New York. There you'll get to know celebs and stars who will warm to your unique style and, in time, crave and covet your latest collections. And who knows what glamorous occasions you'll be designing for...

6/ Your reputation is starting to grow and it's time to prove yourself on the world stage amongst millions of other players. This is your chance to show your interior designs and outfits in challenging online themed contests, whether it's celebrity style or coffee casual, from red carpet to haute couture runway...

Ladies, the next big dressup game is here - it's time to write YOUR stylish story.

Questions or requests? Email us at fashionempire@frenzoo.com

title: Fashion Empire - Boutique Sim

descriptionHTML:
EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.

Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.

Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.

Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?

JOIN THE FIGHT
Take on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battles

YOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORY
Make the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefield

UNITE THE LAND
Build your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliances

EQUIP YOUR TROOPS
Discover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilities

DEFEND YOUR HOME
March through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of Dunmar

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES
Hoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboards


Warlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.

Are you ready to join the fight?
recentChanges: Gozura is the artillery officer of the Frost-Blood Orcs. She is feared by allies and enemies alike due to her weapon of choice.
Defeat Gozura in her enclave and collect shards for a new regiment!

Once liberated, this orc regiment will blow up your opponents. This heavily armored, ranged unit provides a damage boost for all allied orcs and goblins while on the battlefield. She uses goblins as projectiles and fires them behind enemy lines for an ambush.
summary: Put your tactics to the test in an epic fantasy universe
title: Warlords of Aternum

comments: This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

descriptionHTML:
Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market!

----------------------------------------

Game Features

• Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can!

• Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond!

• Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!

• Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).

• Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!

• Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!

• Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!

• Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!

• Complete contract missions to earn rewards.

• Can you unlock all of the achievements?

----------------------------------------

Adverts and Permissions

• Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!

• Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!

• Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!

----------------------------------------

With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!

----------------------------------------

Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.

- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.
- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.
- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.
- Do not leave games playing overnight.

----------------------------------------
ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES

- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.

- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.

- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.

- You must be aged 13+ to play.

title: Dirt Inc.

descriptionHTML:
If you want to get rid of stress, then pull the lever and throw a cake on face. Our new antistress simulator will definitely help you coping with your stress. Pull the lever, roll the roulette and send a cake on face of your friend, neighbor or anyone else in our new simulator: Antistress Game: Cake on Face.

Our Antistress simulator will bring you lots of fun. You have a roulette with cakes, pull special lever and roll this roulette to earn a cake, and then pull the lever second time to throw the cake on face of your friend, sibling, neighbor. You may spread pieces of cake over whole face of your target. Draw with cream on the face of your “victim” in this antistress simulator you should use your imagination to earn as much fun as you can. Antistress game: cake on Face is a free to play antistress AR simulator. Pull the lever to roll a roulette and pick a special cake to throw. comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..
Great time killer The only reason I stoped playing is eventually it would not let me see my scores without having to share on internet. I would not.

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out
summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

descriptionHTML:
Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer!

RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world
DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron!

*Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games
*Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy
*Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes!
*Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider!
*Challenge and compete with your friends

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.

Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.

A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.

A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.

A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.
developerAddress:
PlayStation Mobile Inc.
2207 Bridgepointe Parkway
San Mateo, CA 94404
United States

comments: You deserve 4-5 stars but you need to solve some issues first: 1: crashing into grass?...really? And I didn't even touched it.  2: I want the car to stay straight and the entire map to rotate according to my driving direction. Just like I would be in the car.  3: Make the area of the buttons larger to have a more accurate driving.  4: I would like, when I'm driving, the entire screen to zoom in a little to be able to drive through narrow spaces more quickly.  Give me the satisfaction of playing and I'll give you your 5 stars on all categories.

The ads are incredibly annoying but only because they last far too long. They're not all that frequent so it's not so bad. I really enjoy the simplicity of the game, a lot of these parking games are 3d now and I don't much care for it. I'm ok with the controls but a little wheel might be better. It's pretty fair overall and the difficulty curve is pretty good for me as I have a short attention span. Amendment: after level 30, the game changes into trying to navigate heavy traffic in a car with no acceleration whatsoever. Not fun at all especially as the car you're driving is clearly a 458.

comments: All is excellent. Great selection of cars, easy controls, strategic maps. It's all of that for a game this size, and it's great!. But I think it misses some things, which I want it to be added: 1) stickshift like control. Manual feel. 2) multiplayer. Kind of feeling a bit lonely. 3) more way to tune the car. Etc. Gear ratios, tire pressure. 4) more variation of game mode and upgrades that suit them? As of for racing mode circuit like style. Rather than all those, the game is already excellent and simply amazing.

Good day devs, I really liked your game. Free tuning for the most part was my reason for playing this game. However, I'd like to suggest to add some more tuning features, like toe tuning for tires, etc. Also, I understand the game is all about drifting, but will it be possible that you guys give some grip to the tires? It will still be possible to drift with grip anyway; the "much sliding" is not so pleasant - for me that is. Overall, I really love this game. Thank you, hopefully you think about my suggestion.  Update: also, pls add clutch pedal option. The brakes also really need some work guys. Please..

It's a very nice game but you still need to improve controls a little bit cause even though I'm now turning too much it always ended up oversteering. Also the graphics needs improvement, the smoke(actually not existing by now), the car reflection(based on what type of the paint is, like chrome,matte etc) and the textures of the environment. Another is the sounds, it doesn't sound that good(on other cars like the s15). Also the customization is not existing by now but i recommend adding it. It will make the game better. Overall, the game is good but it needs more improvement üòä Cheers Devs! Peace out!

Developers, I really would like for you to make the handling less "sharp" and more detailed. When i go around a corner, I feel like i can spin out at any time. I'd also really love for a additon of body kits and more wheels and maybe even more cars. But please, work on the controls. Its not very grippy. I also play Drift Horizon, and I've got the drifting down on that app. Thank you.   -Michael

Great game the best drifting game I have ever played... But it could do with some body kits and stuff... Also could u add more cars and tracks plz it's getting a bit boring just racing in the same cars but. Thank you üòÑüòÑüòÑ
this is just a more gay version of drift horizon and car x drift racing combined car feels super bad to drift no multiplayer. just an all round bad game and the cars sound like a lawn mower

descriptionHTML:
Tom, a Genius School graduate, is looking for his dream job. What’ll it be? Astronaut? Firefighter? Pilot? Guess again… he’s decided to become a superstar hairdresser! Only problem is, his bosses don’t let him touch actual hair… unless it’s on the floor. Poor Tom is only allowed to stick to menial tasks like scrubbing floors and answering phones. Play this mischievous hairdressing game to help Tom cut his way from “barberchop” around the corner to world-class designer hair salons… all while avoiding his bosses’ watchful eye.

Cheating Tom graduated Genius School. Now he’s got to enter the real world and get a job. So his days of sneaking around are probably over, right? WRONG. As they say, “once a cheater, always a cheater.” Play this game to help Tom become an amazing hairstylist without getting caught by his annoying bosses who are determined to keep him sweeping the floors day after day.

Features:
> Help Tom sneak his way from hair salon to hair salon!
> Hurry up and get playing! You’ve got 25 different hairstyles to master as you play this crazy game!
> Make sure he cuts and styles customers’ hair as quickly as possible before his boss notices.
> Tons of challenging levels & supercool game play modes for ultra sneakiness.
> Score power-ups and collect coins to become sneakier than ever.
> WARNING: You may encounter some extremely peculiar customers…!
> Chop-chop! Cut that hair as fast as you can, and make sure the customers are satisfied, OR ELSE!
> Choose your game avatar - Tom or Taffy – and get cutting!
> Dress Tom and Taffy up in crazy costumes.

description: City Drift : Race Real Car High Speed Racing Drive is the modern car racing game as the user will  get the chance to drive the cars in famous racing tracks as the user will be provided the best car to be driven on these tracks. This is a modern car racing game as the user will have ultimate options like unlocking new and amazing tracks, drive fastest motorsports racing car. The game is an exclusive asphalt racing game as the user will drive the high speed turbo boosted on packed streets. The game features rush hour traffic racing as the user will navigate through the traffic roads like one way and two way traffic roads the user will avoid the crashes with car and other vehicles like Trucks, Vans, Buses and Motorbikes. The game features most realistic in car cockpit environment with realistic car controls. The user can join underground car racing circuit as the user will take the car in Drag Race, Track Race, Drift Race and Illegal Street Race. Enjoy the speed of pleasure on a variety of tracks. At the same time this game has a high quality picture and smooth operation, so you experience different racing games.Bring fast speed driving experience, be the king of street racing. Improve your driving skills in racing car mode, and take part in competition with your friends, and become the bet among street racers. Have the realistic experience of driving on Mountain road of Alps, Coastal road of Venice, Desert road of Nevada, Muddy road of Amazon, Asphalt road of Monaco, City road of Tokyo, Snow-icing road of Himalaya, Night road of London, etc. Become the fastest driver in the city and earn respect from other teams. Show them who the real car racer is. Experience realistic car driving simulation game, speed past vehicles, drift around tight city corners or open car parks, flip and wreck your car with real time vehicle damage, see each scratch and dent with each car crash. Control your Car with arrows, accelerator while steering wheel different cameras. description: New super cute kitten games for girls and boys who love cute little cats! Kitty Meow Meow welcomes all kids in her adorable cat world. · Collect as many coins and pink diamonds as you can!
· Watch videos with Kitty Meow Meow and get more coins for new game items!


Free & Paid Game Content
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money.
You can play Restaurant, Mall, Manicure, Pink Hair, Magic Castle and Horse Riding mini games for free. Curly Hair, Purple Hair, Cross a River, Find a Diamond and Flower Fun mini games are free to play but certain game items or activities are locked with game coins and video ads.
You can purchase separate mini games (Cat Face, Coat Care, Cat Toilet and Dance Club) or the full game version with no ads.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

PRIVACY
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

comments: A solider game with guns wow I love it

This is AMAZING! What I want, though, is a way to change the camera app you use for the app. I know that bots might not be possible because the phone camera wouldn't be able to recognize the environment; it doesn't even have that feature. So all I'm asking for is a way to change the default camera. I would give 5 stars if you did. Not that you would need it; this app is already highly rated.
I LOVE this app, it is so much better now they have introduced currency.  The only thing I would improvenis that you could take videos as well as pictures.  This ia definitely a 5 star app!

Jonahs idea is brilliant! If you guys could figure out a way to incorporate  bots into the background of this. Running out of streets posted up in buildings in real life like this.  You might have an original smash hit! In the fps gaming world. Noone has yet to do this! You could even add In explosions and a blood screen for hit damage.

Amazed by this game, nice idea! But you should make it like this so there are bullet holes and when we shoot the RPG it explodes where we shot it at, the explosion moved with the screen which looks unrealistic.

I can see this being a multiplayer game in the future, people going outside playing with friends in the hood with this instead of paintball and stuff... But still needing a lot of improvement.

comments: The game was pretty good... The only problem though is that the gamer does not always work. The only time I have noted that they don't work too well is when I am trying to build a wall, or wall with a window. It won't let me put it down when the space is clear and on the edge of the raft, I have tried everything!!! Is it the game or my device?

The game is fun or would be if the game automatically saved so if you does you wouldn't have to start completely over. And maybe if it wasn't so hard to survive and probably more fun as well. Survival simulator is much easier and a lot more fun. Also  unlike survival simulator where I can build it doesn't let me build anything even though it says you're supposed to be able to but it didn't allow me to.

Overall very well made. I love it. Its just like the PC version. üëå 2 things however that could make it even better: 1) Sometimes the view would glitch/turn to one side and i didn't even tell the character to look that way. If the devs can fix that and make the turning smoother, that would be great! And 2) Sometimes i can't switch from one item to another. That can be very bad when i am trying to get to my spear to protect my raft or switch to drink my cup of water. Fix those things, and this game will be golden! üëçüëå

This is actually a great game. Just sometimes i can't click on something, so i will just go to main menu and then back to game, nothing too serious. And after a few minutes playing, i have 4 nets, 4 trees, 4 potato plants, 4 grillers, 4 purifiers, 4 chests, which i can guarantee that i will never run out of food, water and resources, then this game become boring. Need story or more items to build like maybe bed or something like that. Great job!

Well it had ok graphics and had an ok things to build bit whenever the shark vame i couldnt get out my spear to kill it. Also sometimes it glitched and i couldnt vuild anything. And lastly the hydration and starving meter went down way to fast i was constantly fishing and scooping up water.

This game sucks. Hydration doesn't last at all. And before you can learn to build raft parts, the shark eats your raft.   Mainly, the buttons glitched out and didn't respond for when I wanted to switch to my grapple, or my tin can to collect water. So... im uninstalling.
description: Do you like to play survival games ? Imagine that you are only one person is survived after catastrophic crash in ocean! You found yourself all alone on the small raft wandering in the ocean. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of debris passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash! Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive! The angry and hungry shark is always near your raft, waiting for you to fall down so you gotta be careful! Gather resources from the water to craft equipment and instruments, find food and drinkable water to stay alive and expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in!Try to catch barrels, leaves, wood and other staff standing lonely on a raft! Beautiful ocean, wind, waves what else is needed? Yes anything. So throw your hook and try to catch staff!== Survival On Raft features:- Completely new survival experience!- A real raft in the middle of the ocean!- Crafting, building and surviving!- Very cool looking graphics!If you are a huge fan of other survival game ( survival in the sea ), play Raft - Try to Survive simulator ‚Äì it‚Äôll be just what you‚Äôre looking for. Completely new experience when you are on the edge of life and death! Begin your survival adventure now!
descriptionHTML:
Do you like to play survival games ?

Imagine that you are only one person is survived after catastrophic crash in ocean! You found yourself all alone on the small raft wandering in the ocean. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of debris passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash! Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive! The angry and hungry shark is always near your raft, waiting for you to fall down so you gotta be careful! Gather resources from the water to craft equipment and instruments, find food and drinkable water to stay alive and expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in!

Try to catch barrels, leaves, wood and other staff standing lonely on a raft! Beautiful ocean, wind, waves what else is needed? Yes anything. So throw your hook and try to catch staff!

== Survival On Raft features:
- Completely new survival experience!
- A real raft in the middle of the ocean!

description: How to Make Spider HandHow to Make a Hand of a Spider - an instruction to create a spider's arm!Have you dreamed of possessing super ability?Everyone thought about it!It's time to turn dreams into reality!This appendix details how to make a device for shooting spiderweb!Everything is not as difficult as it seems!Three variants of execution are presented!In the first case, we need tubes made of paper of different diameters!Support frame, also made of paper!Two mounts on the arm!Two piston mechanisms and a hitch!The lower piston together with the hitch forms the trigger mechanism, for which the upper piston is fixed!The upper piston will push out a shell made of paper and a white thread!Look carefully at the pictures and follow the instructions! Press the trigger!The second way is similar to the first!We need several tubes of different diameters, made of paper!The third option and other the most difficult, you will learn in the game!We fasten the mechanism to the fastening and everything is ready!Spinning all your friends with a spider's hand! Feel yourself a hero!Now you jokingly can shoot cobwebs like a spider!Share the app with your friends and have fun together!Start to invent right now!Leave your comments and ratings!Invent with us!
descriptionHTML:
How to Make Spider Hand
How to Make a Hand of a Spider - an instruction to create a spider's arm!
Have you dreamed of possessing super ability?
Everyone thought about it!
It's time to turn dreams into reality!
This appendix details how to make a device for shooting spiderweb!
Everything is not as difficult as it seems!
Three variants of execution are presented!

In the first case, we need tubes made of paper of different diameters!
Support frame, also made of paper!
Two mounts on the arm!
Two piston mechanisms and a hitch!
The lower piston together with the hitch forms the trigger mechanism, for which the upper piston is fixed!
The upper piston will push out a shell made of paper and a white thread!
Look carefully at the pictures and follow the instructions! Press the trigger!

The second way is similar to the first!
We need several tubes of different diameters, made of paper!

The third option and other the most difficult, you will learn in the game!

We fasten the mechanism to the fastening and everything is ready!

Spinning all your friends with a spider's hand! Feel yourself a hero!
Now you jokingly can shoot cobwebs like a spider!
Share the app with your friends and have fun together!
Start to invent right now!

Leave your comments and ratings!
Invent with us!
summary: How to Make Spider Hand
title: How to Make Spider Hand

comments: Great game but still needs some finessing.  Some of the levels don't have a 3rd star or impossible to get due to a bug making the star stuck.  Controls are such that it can be tough to get the 2nd gunner into a fight, let alone the 3rd gunner.  I kinda miss some of the weapons of the 2nd game, but I understand where they're taking the game and the upgrade system is great.  Also really like the use of color and lighting for this game.Soon will be approaching the end of the game.

Graphics and the game is so cool. This game is one of my favorite game. The worlds and levels are so cool.even the monsters are cool.  And the sound of the game its so cool..  I appreciate u guys hard work.   I would like to give u guys a feedback,  Ummm, We want new worlds, levels and more features pls update the game.... And can we use the same vehicle at any levels pls, because after unlocking a vehicle again we have to upgrade the vehicle. :( and while we play the game when its over we don't get any coins, we just have to complete the whole level and then we are getting the coins. Pls update the game.   Thankyou. üôè

I LOVE this game. I played the first two games years ago and was very excited to play the beta of this game. Now that the official release is out, I'm pretty disappointed to see I have to PAY for unlimited ammo after being able to have it FREE for months beforehand. Maybe I'll change my mind, but I'm thinking about not uninstalling...

üòÖ This game is epic fun! The controls are great, graphics run smooth and the characters are cute AF, what could go wrong? Oh yeah, other than those cute little blobby brats being eaten alive by those darn monsters! Your job is to protect them, why are you reading these reviews instead of doing your job! Download it already and let's protect our peeps! Or cute emoji guys, whatever they are! It's time to take action and press that download button!

This game is pretty Amazing. I myself am a Hopeless fan I've been a fan since the first prequel. The only thing that's bugging me is that there is either no third star in some of the levels or the third star is glitching and I can't get it, basically what I'm saying is that I can't get the third star in some of the levels and it is impossible for me to get all the stars in the game even if I tried. Can you please fix it:)

Can you guys help me with the glitch I have on the game, the glitch is that it would not load the game. It stay loading for more than 30 minutes and still be at the loading screen. Please help me with this. I would really appreciate it....and I do want to play game...seems fun... But it won't load.

descriptionHTML:
The cute blobs are lost in the limbo of the dark cave, this time it’s really Hopeless! Join the adventure and save as many Blobs as possible - any Blob counts. Ride the not-so-powerful car, shoot and push the cruel monsters. Your goal as the Blob Rescue Mission is to reach the next dirty blobby base and escape the dark den.
The only way to survive is by shooting the monsters using blobby deadly traps.
What rises from the deep darkness? Keep your eyes open for the ugly monsters!
The cave is divided into 4 underground world zones, from dark ice and deep lava to the glow mushroom prison!
Unlock and collect an array of carts, cars, and tanks, and arm yourself with powerful guns to defeat the evil monsters!
Upgrade your ride from one tiny cart with a pistol to a mighty war machine on wheels, ready to take on any challenge!

Do you have the skills to survive the journey? Will the niedlich blob escape and see the light of day? Or is it all HOPELESS?


“If you thought the monsters from the original Hopeless were disturbing, check out their upgrades in the series' third game”
Android Police


"It's a bad situation for the blobs to be in, so bad that you might call it hopeless”
Tested.com



KEY FEATURES:
★ Advance through the adventure cave with 50 levels!
★ Play in competitive Endless mode!
★ The blobs have nothing to lose :)
★ Buy funky hats for your cute Blobs ! (Hats help the blobs to escape reality)
★ The only game where you can upgrade a pistol into an M16

FOLLOW US:
www.upopa.com
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/UpopaGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hopelessthegame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/UpopaGames

description: ‚òÜ Optimized for low-end phones. ‚òÜWelcome to Car Crash Simulator & Beam Crash Stunt Racing SG!High-speed car driving is never complete if car crashes do not occur. Fast speed stunt racing game is experienced by everyone but there are very few fast car driving games in which realistic car crashes & car damage are shown. This car crash stunt racing game is equipped with master gameplay physics and high quality stunt racing accidents. Show virtual driving skills with the different level car crashing and enjoy realistic car damage of luxury cars. You will be surprised to see a varying level of car destruction when you hit something at high speed. At a speed of 100 KPH, you will accomplish 99% demolition. Experience the ultra realistic crashes and car damages with offroad speed bump stunt racing game. The chances of being hit with the opponent car are more as you cross the side lane or go offraod racing. You can prevent car destruction by keeping your speed car in the same lane. Cross speed bumps with high speed to crash with full speed. Not only high speed is the factor involved in a perfect crash, the angle with which your strike hard into the rival car is also important. Maintain high speed on city tracks to dazzle with obstacles. Tilt car with rapid steering on sloppy roads to enjoy dangerous car crash ride. Play various gameplay modes in this stunt driving game such as offroad track racing, artificial obstacle stunt mode and extreme fast city ride etc. You can find yourself in a deadly crash on roadside or New York domestic tracks when you exceed speed limits.Modern fast track endless car crash game provides you the ultimate chance to take the beast out and experience living as a real-life destruction driver. Each track is composed of almost 20 bumps, 10 signals and plenty of vehicle types to crash with such as high roof cars, transport trucks, tractor trolleys and much more.  Car crashing missions require different no. of holy crashes to complete the mission. Fall down the sideways to crash into old trees, telephone antennas metal base, or into the green belt to damage your euro car. This brand new idea of 4 wheel drive crashing is basically to add fun to the racing games. High-speed racing with monster crashes is something you never played before but this idea is flourishing very speedily. Drive various luxury cars and sports models to enjoy extremely high speeds being displayed on the car speedometers. You can review your high speed crashes lately after the completion of crashing mission. Boost display is also displayed along with the car speedometer. You can also use the right key left key or a circular steering for cruising speed cars. So what are you waiting for? Get started with the brand new road car crashing simulation game!Car Crash Simulator & Beam Crash Stunt Racing SG Features:- Realistic Game play with destructible vehicles- 3D vehicle crashes with 3 camera views- Compelling Background music- Drive with variety ofluxury vehicles- Examine crashes in replay mode- Destructible cars with hydraulic hand brake- Experience a Real Accident Simulator - Enjoy the main engine damage and the car crash- Nitro booster for high speed- Dynamic sound of the deadly crashes

comments: This is one of the best downloads I've made! As many people have said, the graphics are amazing! There's no lag, and there is a lot of variety ad for ways to play. The gameplay keeps me motivated to create and unlock new characters, I love the diversity that each character has for both looks, and actions!! This game is not too easy, nor too hard! I would definitely recommend!

This is a really fun idea. Giving each character a unique control scheme has the potential to keep the game interesting; however, most of them are very clunky and hard to control. I unlocked all but about three characters, and really only liked the controls of one (the dragon). The others were too frustrating to play as.

Over all I really liked this app but I do agree that when you collect coins the game changes the amount you know how when you mix things. Well I was when I lost space and one of the things I didn't need so I would end up with 150 coins plus on my 800 coins and and it gave me 950 and then it quickly went to 856. Over all its just nice to know that people  play and enjoy this app as much as me. And find some characters easy and difficult to use. And the graphics are amazing. (Can you add more characters and the robot with the  legs not get stuck in the stone). Thank you for reading my statement.

Fantastic game! Came back specially to give a review. For those complaining that it's hard to control the characters,... That's the point!!! >< It is basically a flappy bird kind of game with different characters.. it lasts quite a while because you want to buy and combine essences to make new characters. Coins are easy to earn in-game, so no worries there. I think they fixed the problem with level design too.

description: Welcome to Mixee Labs, the place where science meets adventure!Mix powerful ESSENCES to create your own MIXEES and run to collect Coins, Treasures, Keys... WHAT IS AN ESSENCE?? It is a substance with special attributes. When you mix two Essences you'll create your MIXEE.WHAT IS A MIXEE?It is a minion, unique and with special features and movement controls.Every Mixee gets one attribute from each Essence mixed.Discover them all in this crazy adventure!You will find all kinds of minions! Cute minions, Weird, Awesome, Creepy, Funny minions... The imagination is the limit! Enjoy this two different sections in the gameTHE ALCHEMY-Buy essences.-Mix them to create your Mixee minionsIn the alchemy fase you will have to choose wisely whis essence to mix to have the best Mixees.THE RUNNER-Pick the Mixee minion you like the most-Run, Jump, Fly, Throw... your Mixee minion as far as you can-Collect Coins, Treasures, Keys, Stars...The Runner map will change every run, and traps and obstacles will be placed in different positions. Featuring-Essences with attributes [e.g. Unicorn head: Fantasy, cute, rainbow]-Unique Mixee minions with exclusive movements and controls. -Tricky traps and obstacles: [Walls, Spikes, Bombs...]-Needed collectable items [Coins, Keys, Stars...]
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Mixee Labs, the place where science meets adventure!

Mix powerful ESSENCES to create your own MIXEES and run to collect Coins, Treasures, Keys...


WHAT IS AN ESSENCE??
It is a substance with special attributes.
When you mix two Essences you'll create your MIXEE.

WHAT IS A MIXEE?
It is a minion, unique and with special features and movement controls.
Every Mixee gets one attribute from each Essence mixed.

Discover them all in this crazy adventure!

You will find all kinds of minions!
Cute minions, Weird, Awesome, Creepy, Funny minions... The imagination is the limit!


Enjoy this two different sections in the game

THE ALCHEMY
-Buy essences.
-Mix them to create your Mixee minions

In the alchemy fase you will have to choose wisely whis essence to mix to have the best Mixees.

THE RUNNER
-Pick the Mixee minion you like the most
-Run, Jump, Fly, Throw... your Mixee minion as far as you can
-Collect Coins, Treasures, Keys, Stars...

The Runner map will change every run, and traps and obstacles will be placed in different positions.


Featuring

-Essences with attributes [e.g. Unicorn head: Fantasy, cute, rainbow]

-Unique Mixee minions with exclusive movements and controls.

-Tricky traps and obstacles: [Walls, Spikes, Bombs...]

-Needed collectable items [Coins, Keys, Stars...]

C/Sophia Germain sn. Edif. Lleret.
Parc Bit. 07121 Palma de Mallorca. Baleares. Spain

summary: Create your Mixee in the Lab and run as far as you can in this Adventure!
title: Mixee Labs

description: Cute baby panda Lu promises new and crazy nanny games for kids and toddlers! Don't forget to help your mummy at home too! When sleepy and tired, put baby panda Lu to bed and help her fall asleep after a long and wonderful day. comments: Players with bigger screens have an easier time winning duel matches using more fingers to tap shots faster than those with smaller screens, and the chance slot machine is too hard. This game is too difficult to earn money in before being able to afford big and fast guns. I think a good idea for a second game would be to be able to walk around and place blocks with a secondary fire as well as being able to  destroy them.

I really like this game. I like how u can use ur imagination to build ur own gun! I also like that there are upgrades. But there is only one thing that is a problem to me and it's that I always press the back button on my phone and it leaves the game so I have to re-load the game and restart what I was doing. But other then that, the game is great

It's soooooooooo pay2win I can't even begin to say how hard it is to get better stuff. I only have steel right now and I competed against someone with gold and it's soooooooooo unfair. If you can fix this then I will give better rating

If you are good at the game, you will absolutely destroy everyone who is not also good. Also, matchmaking is poor at best. I don't want a plastic gun and be matched with a wooden guy who is doing his first run of the game. Finally, gambleing is VERY profitable. almost Too profitable to be balanced.

BACK button problem Whenever I'm in a battle or crafting a gun or something, I accidentally press my BACK button on my phone which makes you exit THE WHOLE GAME and I have to loaded up again, please concider adding the BACK button that's on devices to be part of the game.

The gameplay is fun and casual. My only two complaints are that upgrades can be hard to get and require a lot of grinding in an otherwise simple and casual game, and also that I have no idea what kind of math is being used to calculate win percentage. I currently have 70 wins to 1 loss which is a 98.5% win rate, but according to the game I have a 3500% win rate. It's only a minor detail but if anyone has any idea how that's being calculated, I would love to know.

comments: Well how about the fact that you can only play half of the game, then you have to buy the other half of the levels.  Even buying the levels, the game on a whole, was a bit cr*ppy so I wouldn't waste my money. Maybe Goblin LLC,  should say that you have to buy almost 10 levels. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion so mine is: the game was bad. üòà

I wish these dumb ass games tell you that you can only play 9 levels before you have to buy the rest of the game. Having to pay for any part of the game means it's not free like you claim it is. Don't waste your time with this game.
Well, I bought the 1st package for a dollar and played level 10 and I opened it this morning and the levels 10-12 are locked again. Wasted a dollar. Don't waste your time with this. Uninstalling

Once you pass level 9, you have to pay for VIP. I don't like this and am uninstalling this app because of it. This was supposed to be a  free app. This is very disappointing, for I liked this app. I have been playing it all weekend, and just now passed level 9, which then said if I wanted to continue, i would have to pay for VIP. I am appointing any one who is going to get this app, to not, because of this. It is very dissappointing. The graphics however, are excellent, same with the gameplay. If you're stuck ok a level, you can click the lightbulb and it will bring you to a YouTube video showing you how to get through the level which I found really useful, because these levels are pretty difficult. If you read all this, wow. Good job. And thank you for listening to my advice.  And Goblin LLC, I wish you did better and thought of others when making the VIP part. I won't be downloading any more of your apps.   Thank you.

It is very challenging yet very fun. I finished 1-9 in a couple of hours. I do not like the fact that I cannot do 1-18, though. Plus, there are too many advertisments.  Overall, the game was extrordinary and very relaxing and satisfying, but you guys should limit the adds and give us more free levels to do. Thanks!
Ad placement is too distracting, graphics not that impressive even for being free.

descriptionHTML:
Wanna some pizza? Craft it! Time to become a cooking chef of an Italian restaurant. Cook your own food and serve your hungry customers to survive a real restaurant fever! Cooking, crafting & building!

Enter the blocky world of cooking
Become a manager of a small bistro and try to stay in business. Start your exploration adventure in the kitchen, where cook delicious Italian food (pizza, spaghetti, gnocchi) or… some not-so-Italian burgers! Your customers are hungry and they won’t wait forever for their orders. Crafting and cooking isn’t as simple as in mama kitchen, but it’s an only way to become a cooking chef! Restaurant cooking games can be tiresome, but it’s not a tycoon. Cook like Sara, a famous Italian grandma, with Pizza Craft - the only simulator of an Italian chef cooking master!

Endless pizza quest
You can start your cooking adventure in a small bistro, but what’s better than crafting & building your own restaurant? Improving your cuisine lets you serve more customers, so you need a bigger kitchen and a bigger restaurant building! This is when this blocky cube sandbox adventure starts to get really fun: use blocks and your imagination to craft & build anything you want! Feel pizza frenzy and become a big fish of a restaurant world as the best cooking chef - only in Pizza Craft!

Unlock new pizza recipes and upgrade your kitchen upgrade
As more customers gets satisfied with meals of your pixel pizzeria, you can enhance your recipe book by unlocking new pizza recipes! Cook your own food like an Italian mama and serve new grill or veggie buffet. Adjust cooking chef strategy to please every customer in a hottest restaurant fever! Pizza Craft isn’t just another street food games where you control a fast food van or some other burger house. Here you can feel a passion of a real Italian cooking chef, because cooking, crafting & building possibilities are almost endless!

CORE FEATURES:
🍕 Endless crafting & building opportunities! Craft a restaurant, design its building interior.
🍕 Cook meals like an Italian mama! Kitchen turns hot!
🍕 Unlock new pizza recipes! Cook new food!
🍕Upgrade your kitchen to handle a hottest restaurant fever!

UPCOMING FEATURES:
🍕 Multi craft - multiplayer mode!
🍕 New blocks for crafting & building your restaurant.
🍕 New recipes for cooking more meals.
🍕 Story mode with a craze twists!

Your pizza is cooling down, so don’t wait anymore. DOWNLOAD Pizza Craft NOW and become a cooking chef in one of the best restaurant cooking games for girls of 2017!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
