comments: I loved it. One of the best games that I have played yet. So addictive that I could not stop playing it way up into the night. I also liked the fact that there wasn't any hints. You have to pretty much figure it out for your self. The only thing that I didn't like is that there is not enough stages. The game should have been longer. Please install a couple of more levels.

Wonderful game. The only thing would be if you could give a little hint now and then, it would be really nice. I only say this because I spent half of the time just tapping randomly around my screen hoping for something to happen. But, I digress, awesome game. Also pkease add more levels soon.

Smart and challenging!!! And the graphic is really good. Unfortunately there were only 5 scenarios, not that they were that easy, but really I need more. I think I'm getting addicted to it. Lol. Please, make an update, I dont mind if I have to pay: it's worth it. Great job for the developers, really love this game ‚ù§Ô∏è

It is a very interesting game idea and I like the implementation. But, it has some gameplay issues that should be fixed. If I decide to do an action first instead of another, I will not be able to continue. I could not find the screwdriver in the garage because I had turned off the lights. And so I decided to replay the level, but the game's only option was to start from the beginning of the game.

Great game! Puzzles are actually tricky and may take several attempts. The voice over is the only flaw for me, sounds auto generated and fake. Has 5 missions in total so will keep you occupied for some time but possible to play through all of them in about 2 to 3 hours.

The best puzzle game. It is really awesome, i recommend all gamers who love investigate games to play this, i pretty sure u all like it. It's graphics is good. Just a game for boring times. Really appreciate to your work guys, a big thumbs up üëçfrom me. Keep it up :-)
description: A first-person point-and-click adventure in cleaning up dirty work. Killing is easy. Cleaning up is hard...Mark had a promising future at his father's law firm, until one of his cases got him too close to a top-secret government project. After discovering classified information related to a terrifying biological weapon, he was quickly arrested and falsely imprisoned for treason.Five years later, an unknown benefactor has orchestrated Mark's release, with a catch: he must help eliminate all traces of the very project that led to his arrest.As member after member of the mysterious initiative is eliminated by unknown hands, it's up to Mark to ensure that no loose ends‚Äîand no bodies‚Äîremain.Features‚Ä¢ A first-person point-and-click adventure featuring four unique missions‚Ä¢ A thrilling story packed with intrigue‚Ä¢ Countless brain-bending puzzles‚Ä¢ Free to play (includes an in-app purchase to remove ads)‚Ä¢ 35+ scenes across multiple locations‚Ä¢ Based on a true storyFollow us on Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/nobodiesgameVisit our sitehttps://www.blyts.com/nobodies
descriptionHTML:
A first-person point-and-click adventure in cleaning up dirty work. Killing is easy. Cleaning up is hard...

Mark had a promising future at his father's law firm, until one of his cases got him too close to a top-secret government project. After discovering classified information related to a terrifying biological weapon, he was quickly arrested and falsely imprisoned for treason.

Five years later, an unknown benefactor has orchestrated Mark's release, with a catch: he must help eliminate all traces of the very project that led to his arrest.

As member after member of the mysterious initiative is eliminated by unknown hands, it's up to Mark to ensure that no loose ends—and no bodies—remain.

Features
• A first-person point-and-click adventure featuring four unique missions
• A thrilling story packed with intrigue
• Countless brain-bending puzzles
• Free to play (includes an in-app purchase to remove ads)
• 35+ scenes across multiple locations
• Based on a true story

Follow us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/nobodiesgame

Visit our site
https://www.blyts.com/nobodies
summary: A challenging adventure in cleaning up dirty work.
title: Nobodies

comments: Amazing, excellent game I don't care for most games. This one is great. The physics and animation are incredible. My son and I are mesmerized by watching the little crash test guy fall down, bounce off things, slide, and occasionally get some air. Then we put his face on Mr. Dismount and it's twice as much fun.

What happened? I would have given it a 6 as it is a lot of fun trying to beat your scores. However since I have done an App upgrade the game is now to big for my galaxy S5 and is slower to react. I don't know what happened but it is harder to play now. Please check this out.... I love playing this game.

Stole my money I bought the 3.99 bundle and it took the money out of my account and then gave me an error saying my order could not be processed at the time.  There is no order in my order history but it took the money from my account.  I tried pressing the restore purchases button and nothing happened. descriptionHTML:
It’s time to give the baby bump to the pregnant mermaid because she’s about to become mermaid mommy!

Play the ER Emergency surgery game where the pregnant mermaid is about to give birth to mermaid baby so operate now!

Play the ER Emergency simulator of the pregnant mommy and do the surgery by starting with the pregnant mermaid checkup in the doctor salon. Take her to the ER Surgery room and check the condition of the baby.

The beautiful mermaid Ariel is expecting her little mermaid baby and she needs full care as this is the cesarean birth of the mermaid baby in the baby doctor salon. Prepare your surgery squad and start the bubble bump and the baby shower.

Take her to the maternity room and give birth to the mermaid baby by doing the surgery simulator. She was in a hurry and rushed to your maternity hospital so admit the pregnant mermaid and operate now in the pregnancy kids game.

Mermaid Pregnancy Surgery ER Emergency Game Features:

• Exciting and adventurous pregnant mermaid surgery levels.
• A different Clinic and surgery squad for a check up.
• Check the heartbeat of the pregnant mommy with a stethoscope.
• Use surgical tools to give birth by cesarean birth in the baby doctor salon game.
• Take the pregnant mommy to the maternity hospital for the baby birth surgery.
• Do the check up and start the cesarean birth to operate now!

How to Play Mermaid Pregnancy Surgery ER Emergency:

• Press the play button and select if you want a twin baby or single baby birth.
• Select the check up tool.
• Drag the stethoscope to check the heartbeat of the mermaid mom.
• Check the temperature of the pregnant mermaid if its perfect
• Then drag the BP apparatus and check the blood pressure.
• Take the blood test in the baby shower games.
• Check the blood sugar of the mermaid girls If its ready for the ER surgery.

The surgery squad is ready to operate now! Give a mermaid kiss to the mermaid baby after the cesarean birth in baby shower games.

description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO

comments: Really unique concept. Accurate depictions & commonly accepted stereotypes.  fun to play & appropriate for all ages.  The only complaint I have is that the images you choose to make the associations aren't always immediately recognizable as the objects that they represent. A little more image detail would easily make this a 5 star game for me.  Definitely a fun & worthwhile download.

Really fun association game Starts out easy, gradually gets more challenging but not too challenging. Read a lot of reviews saying it makes no sense but I haven't come across a level that was totally off the wall. My only criticism is that some of the icons are a little difficult to figure out exactly what it is. Overall great app guys!

Sooo close, but no. Falls short in relation to hints. They are useless. One randomly tells you that one of 20 pictures does or does not belong. Always one that you had no question about. Absolutely not helpful. Have to pay to skip it too. Also doesn't let you review your answer when you get it right. I uninstalled it

It's a fun game but the hints and interface can get petty. I have small fingers and I have to angle it right to click the hint button. I know its hard to give specific hints but some are too obvious whether its text or excluding one. I find myself using corrrect the picture hint because its more reliable than the other ones. Even if I want to sit through ads pressing the ad button doesn't work instantly I either have time it right or press it multiple times until an ad pops up.  Otherwise this game is fun but could be better.

A hint told me that if I disagree with the solution then I am an individual :) boy was that accurate. Im struggling to put my mind in the place of the developers at a very early level. I can't for the life of me figure out why a pacifier doesn't have anything to do with a new year. And it kinda went downhill from there for me. Great concept great game! Im just one of those individuals I guess.

I thought that the game would have something to do with stereotypes, like, French people do this or Germans do that. But its nothing like that. I thought it would just be poking fun at stereotypes but it just turned out to be some inane guessing game. I uninstalled it after about ten minutes of gameplay. A real waste if brain cells if you ask me
description: Score a stunning victory! Start playing right now! OK, enough with the stereotypes already. The goal of this game is to match suitable pictures to words. For example: what does a woman keep in her purse?Choose pictures that match up to the task and reveal new stereotypes! Unleash your inner intellectual! Many tasks in the game require you to really get your brain in gear. Don't miss even the slightest detail!Here are some examples of the tasks that you need to choose the right pictures for:night, luck, France, the Oscars, what do people think about when they're in danger?And just remember ‚Äì if your associations don't correspond to what the writers had in mind, then you're unique!‚òë an interesting, fresh idea‚òë loads of albums with tasks‚òë intellectual tasks‚òë achievements‚òë available in many different languages‚òë checking checkboxes is fun
descriptionHTML:
Score a stunning victory! Start playing right now! OK, enough with the stereotypes already. The goal of this game is to match suitable pictures to words. For example: what does a woman keep in her purse?

Choose pictures that match up to the task and reveal new stereotypes!
Unleash your inner intellectual! Many tasks in the game require you to really get your brain in gear. Don't miss even the slightest detail!
Here are some examples of the tasks that you need to choose the right pictures for:
night, luck, France, the Oscars, what do people think about when they're in danger?
And just remember – if your associations don't correspond to what the writers had in mind, then you're unique!

☑ an interesting, fresh idea
☑ loads of albums with tasks
☑ intellectual tasks
☑ achievements
☑ available in many different languages
☑ checking checkboxes is fun
recentChanges: So it's new tasks you want? In that case, you're in for a treat! Enjoy!
summary: Life is all about stereotypes and associations.
title: Stereotypo

descriptionHTML:
This is a free survival and strategy game. Preserve your life carefully and thwart off zombies and other threats. The enemies are everywhere in the living space, you need to keep alert in the fight against other survivors or zombies. Kill them, or be killed.
HORROR SCHOOL:
You can take a chance and go to the abandoned school. God willing, you may be able to find many precious resources to help you create more powerful weapons to boost your chances of survival.
MARKET CENTER: 
The market will be open in the first 30 minutes of each hour. Enter the chat room during those times to communicate with other survivors and exchange information to help you survive. But remember that not all survivors are friendly.
Guild
Do you want to stay alive all by yourself in this doomsday? Maybe you could get some help from the guild. Radio tower is your connection to the outside world. Repair it, then you can unlock the guild. Many more survivors are waiting for you in the guild continent.
UNION TRADERS: 
Union traders may be helpful under the right circumstances. They can never refuse a good deal. Trade with them your unwanted items, as long as your items are attractive enough for them.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarZ-survival-867255676789139
summary: Preserve your life carefully and thwart off zombies and other threats.
title: WarZ: Law of Survival

description: Download and enjoy another stickman simulator and play as a mastermind criminal and break the prison. Play the amazing and latest Stickman Prison Escape Story now and enjoy manipulating guard and prisoners into breaking the most notorious and heavily guarded prison.This stickman version the stickman prison escapes story focus on the story of a lone criminal mastermind who was caught after killing a cop with car accidently. He has been in the prison for years and knows the move and routing of every guard and concerned convicts. He has an escape plan and he needs your help in accomplishing this escape plan. Break the most famous and guarded prison of the year followed by an amazing storyline only in stickman prison escape story.In the stickman prison escape story you have to beat your cellmate on purpose so that the police guard will come in to stop you. Leave the cell immediately and steal the rod of senior guard. Now use the rod to break the lock of the outer cell wall and kill all police guards that come in your way. Collect some cash from room. Using the hammer from labor room break the wall of the cell, the police have caught you in action; they will collect all your weapons now you have to kill your cellmate and all the policemen that come to stop you. Kill your cellmate and collect the steel rod again to break the lock of your cell door. Collect hammer from that room and break the wall again and act fast. Only dangerous prisoners are there so there is no door at this cell you have to break the wall using your hammer. You have to kill that crazy prisoner and then break the wall of his room to proceed to the next level. You have to fight yourself through these difficulties and then you have to make a run for the wall and climb the prison wall to escape from the prison. There will be many policemen chasing you at that time. You have to run faster, dodge the policemen and quickly climb the wall and make your escape.This is the most amazing and fantastic stickman prison break simulator. Make a plan, execute it, act fast and kill anyone who gets in-between you and your freedom. Play now the groundbreaking stickman prison escape story.

comments: This was a soothing game, very pretty, no rush (you can revolve around the tree as many times as it takes to get the right spot) and soft, but vivid colors and music. I love it! By the way, to get the Sewol tree, tap the tree design on the main page 7 times. To get the candle tree, tap the diamond on the main page 3 times fast. I had to look hard for those hints, because the game hint links didn't work for me.

I really like this game it helps me calm down when my anxiety is playing up. It's really pretty too though not too fussed with most of the tree toppers the tree designs are awesome. It would be cool if they had a setting where you could mix the tree designs up or have them appear in a random order on the same tree. The only thing I'm having problems with is that the achievements don't recognise all I've done or the right things. Other than that it's a creative distraction and good for eye tracking skills. I'd definitely recommend it.

üå≤This App. is Super Addictive!!!! Love that you can get different trees and others items!!!                   ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê's  I wish in your next update, you'd make earning Coins available more often via watching ads. Also the amount per ad watched giving more than just 50 coins. Due to the cost of purchasing trees and things being 500 Coins, it takes far too long to achieve. I know you have the option of buying coins​ with cash, but that's not logical for me. Other than that, I would not change anything!! I LoveüíôLoveüíöLoveüíúLove‚ù§this Game!!!üå≤

Fun, calming game to play... a favorite of mine!   Only thing that bothers me a little (and I may be alone here) is the notes that play when you hit the target for songs like 'Jingle Bells' and 'Mary Had A Little Lamb'.  The idea is cute, but I feel like the tunes should be original if any, because a.) they don't follow the beat, so it gets a little grating & b.) considering everyone knows the songs, it can be a bit distracting when you are expecting the next notes. But I've never been a fan of Christmas carols anyway, so I may be biased. ;)  Again, I may be the only one, but there are my 2 cents. Overall, I love the app, and play a little before bed at night each evening.

I love this app, and find it incredibly helpful when I need to decompress or slow down my mind from an anxiety disorder. However, I was thinking how beautiful it would be as a wallpaper for my phone to build a tree, knowing I went through a tough time when I first started building it and the relief I experience afterwards; the embodiment of that as a wallpaper. However when I try to share it -- in an attempt to have some picture of it -- there's always share icons, etc over the tree. Maybe in the future there will be the ability to screenshot the tree without icons, etc. over it to utilize as a wallpaper, or whatever else. If it already has the capability of saving a picture of just the tree, please let me know how.  üòä

It's a good game and all, but there are some things that you can only get with a hint. It says that the hints are found on the Instagram account, but the account is private? But don't get me wrong, it's addictive as ‚Äî pardon my language ‚Äî hell. I just don't understand how you're supposed to get hints when the account is private.

comments: As a motorcycle rider and enthusiast I can honestly say in my expert opinion that this game is the most realistic riding physics game I have played yet. The graphics are really cool and the possibilities seem endless when it comes to customizing the bikes. And I grew up with cafe racer style bikes and this game really hits the nail on the head. I want to make a suggestion to the people who made the game though. Mabey put in some racing levels or an online mode where you can race with fellow players of the game and see what other people have done with their bikes. It would make it more fun and interesting. Other than that, it's really awesome!

This game is really fun and addicting, I play it every time I get the chance since I don't enjoy many mobile games. This one is just a fun chill game where you ride around on a Cafe bike weaving in an out of traffic. I just wish there were more secrets or other things you could do in the game. Maybe like more hidden paths, customize  your character, more bikes, and more maps that aren't super expensive to unlock. Overall this game is really fun

Dear developer, this game is unique! I swear! I love this game very much, had a different story and gameplay from the other motorcycle game in playstore. But... Can you please update the game? I mean, the mirrors (real function, not flat color), look back option maybe, camera option when riding, photograph my bike wherever i park that thing. And if you guys thinking about to add revsbomb and manual gear, i really appreciate it, i should give you a 5 stars if you guys revise this game to be more fun. Once again, this game is awesome, i like it, thankyou for making a little time killer guys!!!

Best bike game, iiif!  The custom is not just caferacer and scrambler style,  rabbit or raised handlebars would be nice. Also, adjusting ride height would be cool. Gastank shape is sadly limited with the bikes default shape. And make the button position adjustable please... But overall a great game for bike enthusiasts,  free and no pushy adds

Game is great had fun and provided an  emmersive experience. As a lover of the Caf√© Racer culture it's nice to have a game that appeals to this specific group. My only complaint would be that I wished that there was more variety in terms of different modes. For example: Online where you can race and see other people's Caf√© Racers  and race against each other or just a AI race mode. Overall a very entertaining free game and I highly recommend it to any motorcycle lovers.

Please make the graphics more like real not like cartoon, add some ways in which we can turn and opt some different roads like in metros. Idea is great. I was really impressed with the usage of various day to day words like TV etc. And do make the oil station working. Add an oil meter so that we can fill oils at the oil stations. Also add some sporty bikes and also a working rear view mirrors
description: Endless moto racing in a unique low poly environment with a never before seen degree of customization. No timers, no fuel bars, no limits.Enjoy a realistically portrayed first person experience in a simplified world that lets you focus on what really matters - the multifaceted joys of motorcycling.Ride your motorcycle in one or two way roads, swerve and filter between realistically moving traffic, through cities, country roads and desert environments. All in glorious Low-Poly lack of detail.Pick from a variety of motorcycles, from small 125cc single cylinder bikes to powerfull in line fours, with boxer and in-line two cylinder motorcycles there for your chosing.Customize your motorcycle to your heart's content, changing anything from handlebars and mirrors to exhausts and wheels. And when you are done, paint them in the color combination of your liking - you can even paint the frame!Share your replays to show off your skills, take pictures of your unique customized bikes to show your creativity.Cafe Racer - a different breed of endless racingGAMEPLAY‚Ä¢ Tilt, Slide,Touch and Gamepad control options‚Ä¢ Use up arrow to accelerate and down arrow to brake‚Ä¢ Press the middle edges of the screen to look aroundTIPS‚Ä¢ The faster you ride, the faster your score will rise‚Ä¢ When driving over 100 kmh, close overtakes will yield extra bonus points ‚Ä¢ Three difficulty levels - bigger danger, bigger rewards‚Ä¢ If you can manage it, try to find alternative routes - bonus points await for high speed‚Ä¢ If you hear a horn, try to move aside - a car is behind you, and it might just run you overFOLLOW CAFE RACER‚Ä¢ https://www.facebook.com/caferacergame‚Ä¢ https://twitter.com/CafeRacerGameCafe Racer will be updated regularly with more content and optimizations. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
descriptionHTML:
Endless moto racing in a unique low poly environment with a never before seen degree of customization. No timers, no fuel bars, no limits.

Enjoy a realistically portrayed first person experience in a simplified world that lets you focus on what really matters - the multifaceted joys of motorcycling.

Ride your motorcycle in one or two way roads, swerve and filter between realistically moving traffic, through cities, country roads and desert environments. All in glorious Low-Poly lack of detail.

Pick from a variety of motorcycles, from small 125cc single cylinder bikes to powerfull in line fours, with boxer and in-line two cylinder motorcycles there for your chosing.

Customize your motorcycle to your heart's content, changing anything from handlebars and mirrors to exhausts and wheels. And when you are done, paint them in the color combination of your liking - you can even paint the frame!

Share your replays to show off your skills, take pictures of your unique customized bikes to show your creativity.

Cafe Racer - a different breed of endless racing


GAMEPLAY
• Tilt, Slide,Touch and Gamepad control options
• Use up arrow to accelerate and down arrow to brake
• Press the middle edges of the screen to look around

TIPS
• The faster you ride, the faster your score will rise
• When driving over 100 kmh, close overtakes will yield extra bonus points
• Three difficulty levels - bigger danger, bigger rewards
• If you can manage it, try to find alternative routes - bonus points await for high speed
• If you hear a horn, try to move aside - a car is behind you, and it might just run you over

FOLLOW CAFE RACER
• https://www.facebook.com/caferacergame
• https://twitter.com/CafeRacerGame


Cafe Racer will be updated regularly with more content and optimizations. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.

title: Cafe Racer

descriptionHTML:
Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone?
Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house? Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!

Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party!

Features:
> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies!
> Throw a secret party with your puppy - choose your favorite party music & show off your dance moves! Shhh... it’s a secret!
> Sing and chat with your pet puppy - she’ll repeat what you say!

> Care for your pet puppy when she’s sick. Take her to the doctor’s clinic!

description: If you're a real fan of bus racing games, bus driving might feel a bit slow for you. Modern city school Bus simulator 2017 is the best bus simulator for all who like bus simulator games, bus parking and other school bus and passenger games. Only this time you drive the modern city school bus which is a big vehicle. Try out modern city School Bus - one of the best bus games of 2017 and become the best modern city school bus driver! Start your driving duty early morning as the modern city school bus driver in 2017 and pick up kids for school. In this real school bus simulator game Bus driver usually transport kids to school and pick them back for home. Some turns and paths in the modern city could be extremely dangerous but be careful about the safety of the kids. Don‚Äôt rush along the extreme big city traffic and play as perfect bus driver. Transport kids to school in this real modern city school bus and fulfill your duty as the school bus driver. Modern city school Bus simulator 2017 is a perfect driving & simulation game to play and have hours of city school bus fun. This modern city school bus game is the best simulator game that will let you enjoy the thrill of going to school after a long summer season vacations on the real school bus. This wonderful city school bus game gives you the real driving feel inside a big modern city of 2017. Be careful and don't crash your bus into the traffic. We hope you will enjoy this newest modern school bus coach simulator of 2017 as this is the season to be a coach bus driver. All the school kids are waiting for the modern school bus driver to drive, arrive and pick them up. Please remember to always drive safe in this modern 2017 big city because your job as city school bus simulator comes with responsibilities. Drop the children at school before the final horn rings and be the best school bus simulator there ever was. Modern city School Bus 2017 is a bus driver simulator game for city bus driver experience that will give you a lot fun playing it. This driving simulator game is real easy to play but very hard to master. So do you think you will be the best school bus driver of the city? Choose if you are going for the real career mode and play the complete 2017 school bus story line and become the most popular modern city driver of year 2017. Modern city school Bus simulator 2017 will make you sit tightly on driving seat of giant city bus. Your mission is to drive giant vehicle carefully and pick up & drop children to their real city destination in realistic 3d modern city bus simulator. Take your driver license from driving school and come to the bus station early in morning to perform your duties as a real modern city bus driver and a perfect simulator. Escape the real city traffic rush hours and drive carefully to avoid road accident in this big modern city or otherwise you will lose your life line. In this adrenaline filled 3d parking simulator, watch out crazy taxi while taking sharp turn with smooth steering. Keep speed under control, as kids are standing inside the modern city school bus as well. The fun game play surrounds around awesome challenges starting with city bus driving by picking students from different residential areas of this big 2017 city and taking them to big high school institution in the other corner of city waiting for them before bell rings. Drive ultimate extreme vehicle on crazy city paths and let students enjoy free school bus ride to road trip destinations in this driving simulator.Key Features of Modern city school Bus simulator 2017 :1. Awesome School Bus Driving Experience2. Pick and Drop School Kids3. Explore the Big City Environment4. Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics5. Smooth controls and fun Gameplay6. Drive different types of school buses7. Thrilling sound effects with real city simulation effects

description: Rover Builder GO is a unique physics based racing game. Build your own vehicle and win the competition!In the garage you can build any kinds of physically accurate rovers from the scratch. Only your creativity sets the limits. When the rover is built you're ready to go. Avoid scary ravines and climb over the hills as fast as you can.You are racing against other real players, trying to rise to the next division. Division rankings are shared every day so you need to stay sharp to climb to the top. As you succeed in the race you‚Äôll get money to upgrade and buy new parts to your rover.Are you ready to compete in this cosmic race of crazy rovers?Internet connection required for full functionality.Follow Us:   * Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/roverbuilder/   * Web: https://www.roverbuilder.com/
descriptionHTML:
Rover Builder GO is a unique physics based racing game. Build your own vehicle and win the competition!

In the garage you can build any kinds of physically accurate rovers from the scratch. Only your creativity sets the limits. When the rover is built you're ready to go. Avoid scary ravines and climb over the hills as fast as you can.

You are racing against other real players, trying to rise to the next division. Division rankings are shared every day so you need to stay sharp to climb to the top. As you succeed in the race you’ll get money to upgrade and buy new parts to your rover.

Are you ready to compete in this cosmic race of crazy rovers?

Internet connection required for full functionality.


Follow Us:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/roverbuilder/
* Web: https://www.roverbuilder.com/
summary: Wild racing and building with physics based mechanics!
title: Rover Builder GO - Build, race, win!

descriptionHTML:
Grow Phone
It’s a new concept game and growing the phone by your touch.

Game Released Event. When your phone becomes 2nd generation, limited Gift free jewels
(until Feb 28th)

■ Feature
- It’s possible to create your phone.
- It’s a new type game and not normal.
- Just by playing touch, you can stress relief.
- It’s possible to see the evolution of your phone.
- Try to play a battery acceleration and booster skill
- Easy to play and various modules

■ Information for enjoy playing
- Signal starts up from a battery.
- When the signal arrives to CPU, RAM, each module, the module is charged.
- When module gauge is full, it’s possible to get the gold
- It’s possible to get more gold by the module upgrade.
- It’s possible to send more signal to module by the battery upgrade.
- By the technical point (TP), it’s possible to upgrade the board.
- If upgrade the board, it’s possible to add new modules.
- Signal speed up by holding touch
- It’s possible to charge the battery fast by battery touch when the battery is out of battery.
- Press the bonus button that appears momentarily in the game. By the bonus button, buff is activated. Also, buff, it’s able to be accrued (Combo).

■ Caption
- If your phone is changed or uninstall the game, the data is deleted. You had batter push the save button.

■ Request Permission
- About the access permission Info.
Request access to permission follow

[Storage]
• Modify or delete SD card contents
• read the contents of your SD card
[Phone]
• read phone status and identity
• directly call phone numbers
[Contacts]
• read your contacts
• find accounts on the device

■ CS
- If you have install or playing problems, please contact to E-mail.
(help@mobile-game.co.kr) We're going to reply it ASAP.

■ Login error solution
1. Run 'Play Games' App
2. Go to 'setting' menu
3. Check on to 'Sign in to games automatically'

■Notice for Load and Save functions
- When you Save a Data, a previous data will be deleted if there is a previous data.
- When you Load a saved data, on going data will be deleted.

■ Brand page : http://mobile-game.co.kr/eng/
recentChanges: ‚óÜ Game released event : If you upgrade to 2nd generation main board, Bonus Jewels will be rewarded.
‚óÜ The battery can be charged to the full amount either auto-charging or click-charging method
‚óÜ Game Stabilization and known bug fix
summary: Released Event! Limited Gift free jewels.(until Feb 28th)
title: GrowPhone

description: Start your own wild adventure in this realistic micro world with Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D! Show who is the best poisonous spider in this human‚Äôs house! Seek for prey, find a mate, make a family, attack insects, cats, humans and have fun!Run across this large world of human‚Äôs house, search prey ‚Äì little insects like wasps, rhino bugs, ants, flies and even ordinary net-spinning spider ‚Äì and fight against your rivals like large dexterous cats or other spiders! Be careful ‚Äì every human being feels nothing but fear and disgust to you, so avoid these dangerous meetings!Don‚Äôt forget to make a family! Build a lair in the darkest corner of this place and find the mate to raise your own little family of spiderlings! Protect your nest with eggs, raise up spiderlings and feel like a real home spider! Chase prey, use your poison to paralyze it and net glands to bind! Transport your victim to your lair to eat it slowly and calmly in Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D!Earn points for every spider mission to customize your wonderful arachnid and level its characteristics up! Keep in mind your spider health, energy, water and food indicators to survive! Check different skins for your spider ‚Äì black widow, golden orb weaver, bird‚Äôs eating spider, European garden spider, Sydney funnel-web spider and many others! Enjoy the life of a real arthropod in Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D!Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D features:‚Ä¢ Ultimate home spider survival simulator‚Ä¢ Chance to mate and raise up little spiderlings‚Ä¢ Large human‚Äôs place full of dangers‚Ä¢ Beautiful 3D graphicsCheck our Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D ‚Äì game for all the animals‚Äô simulator lovers! Learn the way of small but poisonous home spider! Explore large human‚Äôs house and enjoy the beautiful micro world around!Privacy policy:https://haleenwasadi.wixsite.com/wildanimalslife/single-post/2017/02/16/WILD-ANIMALS-LIFE-PRIVACY-POLICY
descriptionHTML:
Start your own wild adventure in this realistic micro world with Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D! Show who is the best poisonous spider in this human’s house! Seek for prey, find a mate, make a family, attack insects, cats, humans and have fun!

Run across this large world of human’s house, search prey – little insects like wasps, rhino bugs, ants, flies and even ordinary net-spinning spider – and fight against your rivals like large dexterous cats or other spiders! Be careful – every human being feels nothing but fear and disgust to you, so avoid these dangerous meetings!

Don’t forget to make a family! Build a lair in the darkest corner of this place and find the mate to raise your own little family of spiderlings! Protect your nest with eggs, raise up spiderlings and feel like a real home spider! Chase prey, use your poison to paralyze it and net glands to bind! Transport your victim to your lair to eat it slowly and calmly in Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D!

Earn points for every spider mission to customize your wonderful arachnid and level its characteristics up! Keep in mind your spider health, energy, water and food indicators to survive! Check different skins for your spider – black widow, golden orb weaver, bird’s eating spider, European garden spider, Sydney funnel-web spider and many others! Enjoy the life of a real arthropod in Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D!

Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D features:
• Ultimate home spider survival simulator
• Chance to mate and raise up little spiderlings
• Large human’s place full of dangers
• Beautiful 3D graphics

Check our Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D – game for all the animals’ simulator lovers! Learn the way of small but poisonous home spider! Explore large human’s house and enjoy the beautiful micro world around!

Privacy policy:
https://haleenwasadi.wixsite.com/wildanimalslife/single-post/2017/02/16/WILD-ANIMALS-LIFE-PRIVACY-POLICY
summary: Start your own wild adventure in this realistic micro world!
title: Spider Pet Life Simulator 3D

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Great game. New problem with update. I can't enter the magic spire. Every time I try, game crashes.

This is the most addictive game I ever played.  Super cool and really fun to play every moment is worth the play. Plus you get to meet so many people all over the world. You become great friends or earth rivals. Thank you for an awesome game and for the interaction with the developers.
Can get expensive... and be sure to keep track of purchases because on numerous occasions i have been double sometimes tripple billed.

comments: Much improved! Very impressed with the work done on the game. Some serious polish has gone under the hood. The current rating unfairly represents the current state of the game.  Everything has been given effort.  From combat to control,  the warp gate and power up detection.  Quests are still a bit buggy,  and some new music and vehicles wouldn't hurt things at all. Game has ZERO pop-up Ads.  All ads are voluntary  and easily can play without ever seeing one.

Just fun to play I have to admit that this game surprised me. I was expecting low gameplay, repetitive and quickly thrown together...but not the case here. This game has amazing visuals, it's fast paced, re-playability is high, and the soundtrack is great. I would love to see more than one life per run. I dont mind watching an ad, but they often dont load which resets the game and any work done for that run. I had hoped that the Facebook issue had been resolved with this last update...but it was not...still cant login.

This is a great game and the concept is amazing. Although I do wish there a lower detail mode for it as my tablet isn't able to run it well and I get input delay. (I am using battery saver mode if that does anything but I would prefer a low detail mode for lower end devices)

Apart from other bugs there's another thing that when you use the warp the banner, that comes on the screen displaying what sector it is, is intrusive and keeps the screen occupied for a very long time. This hinders the visibility and eventually the ship crashes many a times. So, either the banner needs to be more transparent or its visibility time needs to be reduced.

Many obstacles are impossible to dodge if they were in front of you even if you were still far away, cause you don't have enough time to turn. Also some obstacles move towards you right when you're next to them which is also impossible to dodge. Otherwise the game is fun but I won't play it anymore.
Would be a lot better if I can pay to get rid of the ads. I just threw$5 at the game and nothing changes nor do you gain anything. I'm all up for supporting games, but really over the ad aspect

comments: The controls are pretty hard, would be more fun if there were more features, more than just catching the light birds and avoiding the dark ones. Its really gorgeous tho! Maybe levels can take place in more than just snowy villages. Itd be more interesting and fun if the scenery was diverse, all kinds of biomes! and different types of things to avoid. And maybe more game modes would be fun, instead of just the one. Oh and maybe different types of birds too!  In my opinion beautiful but has alot of unfulfilled potential

i love love love the simple graphics. the colours here are vibrant and beautiful. im very pleased with the ability to upgrade your flight time. i also appreciate the realism of the wind sounds when banking and diving. the music is very soothing as well. i play this game a lot during bad trips because it calms me down and helps pass the time through an unpleasant peak. it provides an excellent headspace. you guys did a great job on this üíôüåø

Im a gamer who plays PC, PS4 and Xbox 360. And I have only one word to describe this as. Stunning. Absolutely stunning. There are easy controls and a multiple choice of controls, addictive, smooth, realistic and of course the stunning views. A little heavt on the ads but you can pat for it to go away, and not to expensibe to make them go away either. The people who say the graphics are bad are wrong. They may not be as good as a PC or console but, they must remember that a phone's  graphics card is not as good as a PC or console. For a game on a phone, this is stunning.

I love this game. It's incredibly relaxing, a great game to play when you have a lot on your mind or just want to relax. The gameplay is simple and the controls are very intuitive, so it doesn't require all of your concentration to play, and the graphics are beautiful. This is another strong point in the debate over whether video games are art, because this game definitely is.  My only complaint is that I like to listen to music on other apps while playing this game, but the mute buttons in this game's menu do not work, so the wind is playing over my tunes.

Wow...the control is easy and the graphic is beautifull and well made. Sometimes I see in 3D games what is suppose to be round it's not really round, but in this game it's perfect. The houses the trees have really smooth shape. In the settings there is two modes:smooth animation/lights (or something like that) but I think the light mode can be as smooth as the other setting too. I like it's high quality, the shadow birds can be sometimes annoying but it's OK. I really like the ground is changing (I mean sometimes you go up on the hill and sometimes you go down). BTW I'm on lvl 5 right nowüòÉ

It's a beautiful and simple game, but I'm not a fan of the tilt controls. While I prefer it over the drag controls, it's far too sensitive which makes it difficult to fly steady. The animals that you're supposed to touch in flight are really small and when paired with the hypersensitive controls it's really hard to get them. It's a game that could easily be mastered, but it requires too much focus for me to continue playing. The graphics ARE wonderful, though! If you're looking for a pretty, challenging game this is the one for you.

description: Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Enjoy playing !

description: Everyone in this world love his or her school days, always remembering your school days give a smile on your face even in your bad time. Welcome to the virtual school of the vice city in this Gangster Girl in High School simulator, this will remember your teen school days. Where you have to play as a gangster Girl to do all these things with your teachers, principle, bullyboys and with the classmates that you miss out in your school days.Enjoy the most incredible Gangster Girl in High School simulator with incredible missions to play with. Choose your bully school girl to play with, tease everyone in school in the absence of the principal and show that how funny as well as your bully days was. 3D school environment, beautiful classrooms, and tons of students busy in their classwork give you the realistic feeling of your school days. Where you have to steal your mark sheet from the principal office and try to escape from the principal of the virtual school.Stand against other bully gangster boys, also steal football from them and do not get caught by him. Pick up the duster from the other classroom while teacher is busy in his lecture, do not caught by the teacher otherwise you have to face punishment from the teacher. Tease the other classmates by your funny movement. Fight with the gangster boys of the school that are disturbing your friend. Many more missions are also waiting in Gangster Girl in High School simulation. 3D graphics and fun gameplay made this game to the best school games. comments: So lovely! Good game. You can easily make money and food, breeding and nurturing are pretty fast, unlike other games where you'd have to wait 24 hours or more for things to be done. Interactions with dogs are amazing, thet do so many tricks! I do have some issues with notifications (as in , I never get any ) and the packs; the game freezes completely when I take free or daily packs and sometimes when I restart the game I don't get the bonus from the packs at all.. And I was never able to watch videos for free packs.That is sad, but other than that this game really deserves 5 stars.

I got this game a couple of weeks ago and with the newest update, I can't do anything. Any time I try to click on a dog, the oven to get food, or anywhere, nothing happens. It's frustrating and I don't want to get rid of this game. Fix this problem please, I am too far in this game to restart.
Really like the game but the spin wheel is a joke. Total waste of gems getting the same result each time you try again. Impossible to get more than a 2 star dog. Getting annoyed! Seems rigged to me!

The game itself is fun and i like it, but its way to hard to get tokens to buy dog cards. Especially when one dog card can cost 1,000 or more tokens. Right now I'm stuck in the main quests because i can't level my dogs up enough because I can't get enough tokens without paying real money.
Its an awesome game. Way better than i expected. So easy to earn things and breed etc. The only problem i got right now is that it wont load for some reason. But will keep trying
This game is really good and fun to play there is one problem with the moving around you can't swipe to move around you have to press the arrow

description: Cube nightmare continues! Welcome to the new chapter of Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D scary game!Beware of angry robot bears, tigers, chickens, bunnies and foxes and even worse creatures hiding in the shadows! Welcome to the Cube nightmare safeguarding yourself until the morning comes! Open or close the doors and switch on the light not to let cube bears, foxes and bunnies attack you! Use the flashlight to protect yourself from the attack! Enjoy the atmosphere of pixel horror with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D ‚Äì 3!Face your nightmare with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D ‚Äì 3! Spend seven nights at Cube pizzeria hiding from angry cube bears, tigers, chickens, bunnies, and foxes! These robots were made to help in Cube Pizzeria, but during the night ancient evil awakening inside their bodies, and they become unpredictable and starts chasing you! Who else could be in this nightmare mines? Try Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D ‚Äì 3 game ‚Äì meet cube bear robots and other creatures, and escape from them to survive!Are you afraid of cube bears or other monsters? Turn on your flashlight - it will scare away angry cube creatures that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways! Nevertheless, be careful! If any cube monster has crept too close, it will be the end of your security guard career‚Ä¶ And your life too! Mind your energy bar ‚Äì if it ends, your life would end too. Watch the TV to restore energy and continue your activities as a security guard!Spend seven nights at pizzeria full of scary cube monsters - chicken, fox, bunny, bear robots and ever more! Use a very limited amount of electricity per night to protect yourself from robots‚Äô attack! Stay in your security office, watch cube creatures with cameras and try to survive! When you run out of power for the night - all cameras and light are off and cube robots are able to move! Beware of cube bear robots walking in the pizzeria! Escape from your nightmare! Face cube robots with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D ‚Äì 3!Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D ‚Äì 3 features:All best features from previous partsUnusual 3d environmentNew Cube Pizzeria locations to exploreSeven nights to surviveCube robot monsters ‚Äì chickens, foxes, tigers, bunnies, and bears!Don‚Äôt let cube robot monsters get close to your security office! Spend seven nights at Cube Pizzeria and stay alive! Finish your work safe after five scary and horrible nights with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D ‚Äì 3! Survive being a pizzeria night security guard and escape from your nightmare! These seven nights are going to be the worst nights in your life!
descriptionHTML:
Cube nightmare continues! Welcome to the new chapter of Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D scary game!
Beware of angry robot bears, tigers, chickens, bunnies and foxes and even worse creatures hiding in the shadows! Welcome to the Cube nightmare safeguarding yourself until the morning comes! Open or close the doors and switch on the light not to let cube bears, foxes and bunnies attack you! Use the flashlight to protect yourself from the attack! Enjoy the atmosphere of pixel horror with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 3!
Face your nightmare with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 3! Spend seven nights at Cube pizzeria hiding from angry cube bears, tigers, chickens, bunnies, and foxes! Who else could be in this nightmare mines? Try Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 3 game – meet cube bear robots and other creatures, and escape from them to survive!
Are you afraid of cube bears or other monsters? Turn on your flashlight - it will scare away angry cube creatures that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways! Nevertheless, be careful! If any cube monster has crept too close, it will be the end of your security guard career… And your life too!
Mind your energy bar – if it ends, your life would end too. Watch the TV to restore energy and continue your activities as a security guard!
Spend seven nights at pizzeria full of scary cube monsters - chicken, fox, bunny, bear robots and ever more! Use a very limited amount of electricity per night to protect yourself from robots’ attack! Stay in your security office, watch cube creatures with cameras and try to survive! When you run out of power for the night - all cameras and light are off and cube robots are able to move! Beware of cube bear robots walking in the pizzeria! Escape from your nightmare! Face cube robots with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 3!
Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 3 features:
All best features from previous parts
Unusual 3d environment
New Cube Pizzeria locations to explore
Seven nights to survive
Cube robot monsters – chickens, foxes, tigers, bunnies, and bears!
Don’t let cube robot monsters get close to your security office! Spend seven nights at Cube Pizzeria and stay alive! Finish your work safe after five scary and horrible nights with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 3! Survive being a pizzeria night security guard and escape from your nightmare! These seven nights are going to be the worst nights in your life!
